name: Castle Kingdom Wars
description: Make your own strategy to beat your enemies. Characters have different skills so you can defeat your enemy with different tactics. Knight, swordsman, archer, skeleton, mage, catapult and much more hero are ready to fight for you.

name: Great North Shelter 2
description: Great North Shelter 2 is an atmospheric adventure with a deep story, detailed world and horror elements.

name: Fantasy Shop
description: Manage a shop set in the medieval world!

name: Polilaser
description: Polilaser is a challenging logic game where you have to find the right sequence of moves to complete each level.

name: Trauma: Broken Paradise
description: Awaken in the fragmented mind of a woman, lost in the shadowy corridors of a sinister mansion. Unravel the mysteries of memory in this gripping psychological thriller, echoing the beloved classics of Survival Horror from the 90s/2000s. Dare to delve deeper.

name: Celestial Force: Magical Mayhem
description: Celestial Force: Magical Mayhem is a beat'em up where you are in control of a Magical Girl preventing an alien invasion. Choose your favorite combatent and defeat the invaders with your elemental-adjacent powers and a lot of glitter!

name: Our Mind
description: Venture through unexplored lands and interact with those who have passed to uncover the horrors behind your late friend's death. Free your mind from it's imprisoned state and break the chains that have held you down.

name: Ruslicstan Invades
description: Save Europe from shortage of crappers! The swamp horde of ruslic savages is gushing out, again! Stop the "russian world" leakage from the crapper-state, in the meaty first-person shooter game!

name: Striker of Sky
description: It is a drone sports game that implements the actual drone soccer game system based on VR and multiplayer.

name: Pandora
description: Pandora is a retro-style arcade shooter infused with the haptics and the scale of VR. Face hordes of demons and beat your highscores. Let them drown in a barrage of magic, manipulate time and collect crystals for upgrades and to unleash your most powerful attacks!

name: From the Streets to the Script: A Carabanchel Story
description: Create your character and experience a fun story in which you will meet friends, enemies and partners as you try to carry out a vital project with your friends: to create an anime before you finish your studies.

name: Fort Valen
description: A desert fantasy murder-mystery following young involuntary shut-in Vishara Vakricustos as she attempts to solve a murder plot to prove herself to her overprotective mother.

name: Journey Express
description: A hybrid 2D/3D adventure game pitting the player against countless dangers on a cross-country journey. Manage your resources and keep your party alive!

name: Dreamscape Runners
description: Chaotic fast-paced racing game that can be played solo or with a friend locally! Use various power ups to reach (or open up!) other paths - or use them to mess with your friend.

name: Space Gourmet: Delivery
description: Prepare and cook space food for alien customers, try to deliver it to the customers while avoiding and fighting off hungry space pirates and other players. Complete your delivery, get paid and upgrade your ship to improve your odds of surviving out in the asteroid belt! Play with up to 20 players!

name: Blood Rite
description: A gruesome human resources game. Mine gems to spawn new minions. Sacrifice these minions to keep ahead of the fire. Then use their blood for special powers like shields, power-ups, and daggers to defeat incoming foes. Towers will turn minions into archers, electrocutioners or human crossbow bolts.

name: Train Fever: USA
description: With the USA DLC, a complete American game mode is added to Train Fever. Equivalent to the original European game mode, the player starts in 1850 and experiences more than 150 years of railroad history.

name: The Final Bastion
description: The Final Bastion is a Multiplayer PvP & PvE Tower-defense with a classic Medieval-Fantasy theme. Compete against players in head to head online in a PvP, sending waves against the enemy and growing your economy. Play side by side with your friends in PvE and see who survives the longest.

name: Quest for the Pinnacle
description: In this unique turn-based RPG, your group's escape begins with deciding who stays behind and continues as you seek help from Pinnacle for your homeland! Ask locals about recent events and new places, use your new knowledge in battle, and reach for new heights.

name: Apoth
description: Apoth is a real-time dungeon crawler with rogue-lite elements. Venture to the town of Apoth where many exciting adventures await. Delve through randomly generated dungeons, sewers, caves, crypts and temples.

name: Twerk it Girl!
description: You have no idea what to do? Simply, twerk it!

name: ReverseRoom
description: ReverseRoom is a "play mode" where you move your character, and a "puzzle mode" where you rotate the stage and change the terrain. This is a new type of action puzzle game that uses two modes skillfully to conquer stages.

name: Labyrinthian: Lost 'til Dawn
description: 'Labyrinthian: Lost 'til Dawn' is a horror maze/puzzle game where the player advances deeper into the maze-like forest to maintain survival, trying to last until day. This game uses mouse and keyboard controls (WASD), with other keys gaining functionality as the game progresses.

name: My Summer Jobs: Dialing for Dreams!
description: My Summer Job: Dialing for Dreams! is a puzzle game where you guide a young girl Molly through the world of telemarketing. Test your skills in cold calling, product knowledge and time management to match the right product to each customer's desire and save enough money to make dreams come true!

name: Mimics the Bots
description: Fun game between friends where one embodies a killer and the other the finder. The killer will have to kill bots and impersonate them while the finder will have to unmask the killer.

name: The Watcher
description: Our heroes hear about a strange land, where everything become pixel, so they come to find out what happen here.

name: Risen 3: Fog Island
description: An island enshrouded in the fogs of legend.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: A-Gun MP041
description: This DLC contains the Map No.221-225

name: An Adventurer's Gallantry
description: Disgraced knight-in-training Oren gets a second chance at life as an adventurer in this fantasy visual novel.

name: Hope's End
description: Hope's End is a post-apocalyptic tower defense roguelite with an emphasis on active ability use to succeed. Play as the Supreme Psion and use unique ability sets to rain destruction down upon the monsters that threaten humanity's final bastion!

name: Stacks: Space!
description: Stacks: Space is a space-themed base builder card game with rogue-like elements. Buy booster packs to get new cards, discover craft recipes by stacking cards together, create structures, manufacture drones and droids, defend your base from enemies, visit distant planets, and more!

name: Crimson Connect Origin
description: Survive, collector's heroes!! game is a fusion genre of real-time strategy and roguelike. Survive to the end through defense-style battles

name: Mughaan
description: Explore far and near in the world of Mughaan while battling or sneaking past the divine beings. In an event driven environment, with a complete day and night cycle, the enemies act differently depending on the time of the day. Find your way towards your goal or change the narrative as you desire.

name: eBall 2
description: eBall 2 is a multiplayer arena shooter where players control high-tech balls armed with four different weapons: a rocket launcher, an automatic rifle, a shotgun, and a sniper rifle.

name: Larry's New Wheelchair
description: Larry decided to buy a new wheelchair online and with it he will be settling some scores...

name: Tank Kingdoms
description: Medieval world RPG, large scale tank warfare.

name: The Dragon Queen
description: Enola has lived her own life on a small village secluded from the rest of the world. But soon this will change!

name: Q.u.q.
description: Q.u.q. is a surreal visual novel about a somewhat crude girl that wanders a desert.

name: The Lost Sheep
description: A beautiful, 3rd-person exploration game centered around two parallel stories: a lost sheep trying to find the way home, and a man restoring his life from his dark mistakes. Uncover artifacts from the man's life as he becomes intertwined in The Lost Sheep's journey to his home.

name: Carnage Offering Tower Defense
description: The replicator robots are back! It's 2528. The machines are increasingly infecting the planets with genetically modified monsters. Challenge them and try to stop the onslaught. Upgrade buildings and heroes, mine resources, discover technology and fight to save humanity!

name: The Great Divide
description: The One Being, the Goddess who ruled it all, one day grew tormented by the actions of its own creations. That frustration led to what is known as The Great Divide. Now the world faces unbalance as those spirits fight each other for full control.

name: Elden Bling
description: After overdosing on fentanyl, Tyrone is granted a second chance at life. Seek the Elden Bling, powerful artifacts once belonging to the Pharaohs themselves, and rewrite your destiny...

name: Blackout Hospital
description: When the power goes out while working night shift in the hospital, the emergency lights come on with an eerie glow...

name: Lana and the Milking Table
description: You’ve won a free all day massage! You head to the parlor to find out if it’s legit or not and you meet your beautiful masseuse Lana. You’re about to get the most memorable massage of your life!​

name: Terranny
description: Design and program drones, then send them into battle.

name: Tiny Fight
description: Tiny Knights is an arcade fighting game in medieval fantasy, with elements of management, trade and pumping up the fighter.

name: Artifact Conquest
description: Artifact Conquest is a turn based strategy game, were you fight a vast collection of monsters. While learning about the lore the game is set in. After a long time an evil artifact has resurfaced. You and your team need to stop people from accessing it.

name: Rotten Apple
description: Rotten Apple is a Co-op Zombie-Shooter that lets you dive into a post-apocalyptic New York. Enter the Quarantine Zone with up to 3 friends to defeat the ever-growing zombie horde, secure critical research data and get out again in one piece. Challenge yourselves in the story or wave-shooter modes.

name: House of Jigsaw: Masters of Art
description: Imagine yourself being in the greatest musea by solving the Jigsaw Puzzles of master artists like Monet, Haring, Kadinsky, Hokusai, Rousseau and Rembrandt. All major art style are represented in more dan 100 high quality puzzles. Enjoy the modern UI and 4 difficulty levels (30/120/300/600 pieces).

name: X-Plane 11: Aerosoft - Airport Berlin-Brandenburg
description: With the brand-new add-on “Airport Berlin-Brandenburg” we bring what is probably Europe’s largest airport construction site to XPlane 11.

name: Nightmares
description: A game roguelike, 2D plataformer and run and gun. This game has the proposal to unite the thriller/horror genres with the shooter mechanics and where the plot will be crucial throughout the gameplay.

name: Warp Tango
description: Warp Tango is a casual multiplayer shooter where you eradicate waves of space jungle vermin with your friends. You can play alone or host/join a game with up to 6 friends.

name: Oxygen Caliber
description: Use recoil and grappling hooks to navigate in a dangerous deep space environment as a stranded astronaut.

name: Dungeon of Zaar: Explorer Edition
description: Unlock plenty of amazing content for Dungeon of Zaar!

name: Dual Chroma: Academy Carols
description: Spend winter break with the popular and unapproachable Prince of the Empire in this cozy and heartwarming magic academy dating sim.

name: The Adventures of Mr. Willickers the Rotting Mule
description: Mr. Willickers can never, ever die. He'll chase you until the very ends of the earth.

name: Rhapsody III: Memories of Marl Kingdom
description: Dive back into Mark Kingdom through a series of charming stories that concludes the tales of Rhapsody I and Rhapsody II!

name: Finger Football: Goal in One
description: Score in just one move in this relaxing and minimalist finger football puzzle game.

name: Cosmo Odyssey 2: Comeback to Origin
description: Cosmo Odyssey 2: Comeback to Origin is a continuation of the comedy quest with a Ukrainian flavor about an agronomist from Kharkiv region.

name: Aquarium Designer: Japan
description: Discover the beauty of Japan with the Aquarium Designer: Japan DLC. Take care of new species of fish, add decorative dragons and celebrate Japanese culture with new stories.

name: Lilly's Flower Shop
description: Enjoy the Match 3 gameplay in an intriguing story about Lilly's building her flower shop. Earn coins by matching the gems and improve the entire neighborhood. Use 5 unique boosters like Flower Power. Meet different characters and enjoy the hand-drawn world full of flowers and plants.

name: Tails of Fate
description: Fulfill this tale, as darkness swarms the fantasy lands of Fauna. Venture epic kingdoms and treacherous dungeons in a 2D action plaformer, with Metroidvania elements in a hand-crafted pixel art world filled with souls-like boss fights, dungeon platforming, and difficult dynamic enemy combat design.

name: Fairytale Theatre
description: Momotaro's Adventurous Activity

name: Dogs Day
description: Dogs Day is an incredibly addictive puzzle game in which your favorite furry doggies are waiting for you.

name: Silent Station
description: A social, psychological, multiplayer game based on the rules of the classic mafia, supplemented by the ability to set traps.

name: Exterminator
description: A sudden outbreak of anomalies all over the world. It is invisible to others, but you can see it. Only you can solve this situation. Go to the suspected source and listen to the request of the client. It's hard to figure out the location of the monsters, so you have to be strong and go.

name: Sky Oceans: Wings for Hire
description: Sky Oceans: Wings For Hire is a homage to JRPG classics like Skies of Arcadia. Set in the open skies, experience adrenaline-filled turn-based dogfights as you take the role of captain and unite a party of rag-tag sky pirates setting upon an unforgettable, touching journey.

name: Archeholder
description: Evil robbers continue to seize territories and scare civilians the nearest village. The brave archer volunteered to liberate the nearby forests from enemies and bring peace to their native lands.

name: Yumemori
description: A short, sweet and charming puzzle game about a girl named Aurora, who is trapped in a dreamy room filled with everything she could possibly desire. Explore her wonderland to find a way out and discover the true nature of this fantastical room. All dreams, good or bad, must come to an end... right?

name: Spell Slinger
description: A magical world full of witchcraft and wizardry awaits you in Singleplayer, Coop, PvP and PvPvE!

name: R.A.T.T.Z. Maze
description: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be a Mouse? Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be inside of a Maze? Wonder no more! In R.A.T.T.Z. Maze you will have to rely on the mouse to smell, and your brain to remember! Welcome to the Maze, Good luck!

name: The Quinfall
description: Embark on an adventurous journey to explore the Quinfall universe. Be a part of unique battles and an immersive story with dozens of different professions in the depths of medieval times in an all-new MMORPG experience.

name: Shita ni
description:
A surreal dream exploration game, both beautiful and terrifying.

Shita ni is a surreal dream exploration RPG Maker game. Through the exploration of both beautiful and haunting dreamscapes, you will uncover the different facets of a young girl's mind. This game will not hold your hand. Instead, you will be free to investigate the mysteries of your surroundings at your own pace in whatever way you see fit.

name: The Kaiyo Mission
description: The Kaiyo Mission is a casual, 2.5D, single player, sci-fi based, underwater exploration game set on alien ocean worlds.

name: R-Lyke: Reverse
description: Side-scrolling, retro 2D shoot'em'up with rogue-lite elements.

name: Surviving the Fall
description: In this game you play as an Nordic soldier in a post apocalyptic Open-World, with the beautiful landscape of Norway. The game is a Single-Player survival game where you have to fight against mutated creatures who has been poisoned by a mysterious virus that has taken over the city.

name: Raiders of Valhalla
description: Manage an army of Viking dwarves and lead them to victory! Give them new weapons and armor, choose a village to raid, and watch them destroy everything, get stronger and do it all over again! How far can you go?

name: Pawperty Damage
description: Smash, kick, stomp and chomp your way through a fully destructible city! Go to town in this cathartic action sandbox, either alone or in split screen local multiplayer.

name: Station 99
description: Station 99 is an action-adventure game with first-person shooter (FPS) elements.

name: Jadoraki
description: Experience this virtual reality adventure and become the best Trappist magician. Will you be able to?

name: Hello Neighbor 2: Back to School
description: Long forgotten rumors of children going missing up at the abandoned schoolhouse have begun to resurface, but the only one still there is the cranky old caretaker and his mean watch dogs! Enrich your Hello Neighbor 2 experience with the Hello Neighbor 2: Back to School DLC!

name: Heart of the Killer
description:
Have you ever wanted a vacation from yourself? At the Dream Resort the days slip by quietly in the murmuring pines. But is BB really the only guest at the hotel? And can she escape the dreadful vision of romance which stalks its halls?

Funny cartoon horror game, standalone 8th entry in the "Of The Killer" series.

name: Hot and Lovely 3
description: This is an interesting leisure origami game, which can exercise your hands-on ability. In the game, you must fold the paper as much as possible into the specified cute graphics in the specified origami times. The game is very challenging from easy to difficult.

name: Battlezone: Battle Grounds
description: The NSDF and CCA forces are at war again with 45 new Instant Action maps and 50 new multiplayer maps for Battlezone!

name: Strip 'Em
description: Strip 'Em, is not just a poker game, it's a Fuck 'Em poker game, one where you get sexy ladies to play with you and, should you win, strip for you and even more.

name: Leisure Yacht
description: Sin descripción

name: Arthas: The Game
description: A great game about a Great man!

name: Interstellar Conquest
description: Take planets and assemble your fleet. The conquest of space is now, navigate through asteroid fields and hide in nebulas to outsmart your opponents. Experience the challenge of ion storms disrupting your ship's sensors and become the ultimate space fleet commander.

name: Sun Down
description: Farm crops, collect pets, catch fish, mine ores and craft turrets to build a thriving farm and survive waves of monsters through 4 seasons. Sun Down combines Roguelike and Farm Sim gameplay in a brand new game set in the Sun Haven Universe.

name: Planetary Destruction
description: Fly around in search of a safe planet to land on. Discover what happened to the others, and try and survive long enough to do so. Can you survive in the bullet hell space shooter game?

name: Esdraz: The Throne of Darkness
description: Esdraz: The Throne of Darkness is a Metroidvania game focused on a dynamic combat system with a wide-ranging arsenal that players can tailor to fit their individual combat style. Fight a variety of enemies and evolving bosses while you come up with the best strategy to beat every encounter.

name: Sollarion
description:
Sollarion is a turn-based strategy that combines a collectible card game and a 3D strategy genre. Players summon units and cast spells using their pre-built deck. Summoned units can be moved around the board and attack enemy units and structures. The player who destroys an opponent's portal wins.

It is necessary to occupy resource tiles and build mines there to play more powerful cards. There are also other special effect tiles on the board that expand the range of possible play styles. Each player will find their own winning strategy.

Map terrain and tile layout are different in every match, making Sollarion less repetitive, more complex and more entertaining than its competitors.

name: Mapventure Story
description: In this Action-Rougelite you create your own map in each run and get to decide whether you want to go straight to the bosses or fight more enemies to get stronger. Collect resources from different biomes to upgrade your village and rescue people to unlock more advantages for your next adventures.

name: Hentai Pussy 6
description: What could be more beautiful than hentai?

name: A Slug's Dream
description: Single-player puzzle game about a slug searching for food in a dream-like world of portals, flowers and perils.

name: Battlezone: The Red Odyssey
description: The Red Odyssey begins... with the two new armies: the Black Dog Squadron and the Chinese Army; new unit capabilities such as the Chinese Cloak; 23 new missions and 3 new planets.

name: Cyber Souls
description: Cyber Souls is a souls-like game, tells the story of Cyborg trying to understand its purpose and get the "soul". He wasn't always half human - half machine. The corporation kidnapped him and conducted a series of medical experiments. It's time for revenge.

name: Highscore
description: Highscore is a 2D platform jumper with rogue-lite elements where players collect items to boost their attributes, score higher combos and reach more points. Unlock new features and customize your character as you level up. Compete with other players on the online leaderboard in singleplayer mode.

name: Potato Mash!
description: Wield your mouse like a sledgehammer! Smash through everything in this satirical adventure where "The Potato." the world's most innocent character, turns into an unexpected murderer.

name: Captain MaCaw 2
description: We're not in Guadeloupe anymore Capn'! Captain MaCaw 2 is a Sci-Fi flip screen retro platform adventure game with pixel art graphics and old school chip tunes!

name: Towers of Thana
description: Towers of Thana is an action & strategy game where you invoke magic and summon towers to defend mythologies against a dark corruption. Travel to their homelands and rally legendary gods and creatures to your cause against Ogur, a God turned evil, and his corruption.

name: Marabundle
description: Play a series of small games of multiple genres, each with a unique playstyle and visuals! Defeat skeletons, play cards, ride a train or fight aerial combat in this collection of indie games.

name: Yasogaya Murder Cases
description: Playing as Jack Kaita, a delinquent high schooler, when a set of murders occur at his town, he gets interested to play detective leading him into a dark and dangerous road of hardships, acknowledgement, and ultimately Jack's path to understand who he truly is.

name: Fateweaver: Smash or Pass
description: You are The Fateweaver; an ancient beast of legendary status. It is your job to determine which way Fate will unravel as you dig deep into the psyche of those who beckon. Decide whether to help those who beg for your mercy, or invoke the wrath of the Gods upon those you deem unworthy of existence...

name: Pato Martinez
description: History can be thrilling, learn the importance of the air force during the Spanish civil war, the most important air battles, the pilots that fought and the airplanes they used. Fight through the air around the Jarama, Brunete or Ebro. Learn, at the same time you become a flying ace!

name: Right and Down and Dice
description: Explore randomly generated card dungeons where you can only move Right and Down, use Dice to defeat mighty enemies, gather powerful artifacts and learn new abilites! Will you be able to escape from the dungeon?

name: Ragmonton
description: Ragmonton is a Physics-Based Ragdoll Roguelike > Fight enemies by collecting and combining your body parts for special powers, discover transformations, acquire unique relics and modify your power in a way that every run is unique.

name: The Longest Dungeon
description: The Longest Dungeon is a infinite, dungeon crawler, beat em' up , roguelike, action, game.

name: Darker Tides
description: A beast of unmeasurable power is rising from the depths of the sea, it seeks to engulf the world with it's dark tentacles, it's up to Aala to stop the Kraken.

name: The Tower
description: "I awaken once again. Shackled. Beaten. Broken. And yet there is hope. An opportunity..." Enter the darkness of The Tower. A unique, constantly expanding dungeon crawling experience. Gather your senses and find your way through the hellish corridors of your prison.

name: Terraforma
description: Grow your land by placing blocks & buildings while carefully planning your placements, and make your own little world in this small idle game.

name: First Person Lover
description: A freeware game that serves as an advertising stunt for the Swedish cloths brand Bjorg Borg.

name: Minecraft 4k
description: Minecraft 4k was an edition of Minecraft developed for the 2010 Java 4K contest, where the entry games were required to be within four kibibytes (4096 bytes) in size.

name: The Thing
description: An homage the 1982 movie The Thing, this mod recreates Outpost 31 from the movie as accurately as possible. It doesn't follow the movie as it's simply a recreation of the location, so there is no combat.

name: Lemmings
description: A unique mind-boggling game of multiple skill levels. Take command of the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen. Featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

name: Gridspech
description: A rule-communicating puzzle game about grids and symbols.

name: The Button by Elendow
description:
Every time you press the button you get 1 point.

Every time you press the button your odds to lose all your points increases by 1%.

Good luck.

name: Hot 21
description: This is a classic beauty Blackjack game, which ensures that you can easily start. You can choose different beauties as your opponents according to your own preferences. As long as you succeed in the challenge, you can let the girls dance a hot dance for you.

name: Astronomic Date
description: A collection of 12 casual short dates in dating sim format. Charm these beautiful ladies from a range of settings and attempt to have a successful date that ends with intimacy.

name: Albino Lullaby: Episode 3
description: Albino Lullaby: Episode 3 is a horror adventure game that doesn't rely on jump scares or gore. Escape a surreal, psychological nightmare as the gamespace dynamically twists and contorts around you in real time, while you unravel an equally twisted narrative.

name: Tower Survivor
description: This mysterious tower is really famous throughout the kingdom, rumored to hold countless beauties as well as the greatest treasure in the world.

name: Dark Burial: Enhanced Edition
description: You play as a sentinel who needs to fight first squads of the enemies and light signal fires. The sentinel can shoot arrows from his crossbow and use shot arrow as a platform.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Ascension: Scenario Senranyamazu
description: An additional scenario for "Nobunaga's Ambition: Sphere of Influence - Ascension" Ieyasu Tokugawa and Hidetada fall in battle at the hand of Yukimura Sanada. A revived Toyotomi clan and other powerful Daimyo throughout the land watch eagerly for their chance to take control of the land.

name: Target G
description: This is a legend about a mermaid, is your target a fish or a beauty? Maybe you can't find the real goal in your heart!

name: Regenesis
description: Guide a group of survivors trying to strive in this alien yet familiar environment. Fight against mutated creatures and use their parts to craft and upgrade your weapons.

name: Train Simulator Classic: Suburban Glasgow - Airdrie Route Extension
description: Embark on more journeys through the densely packed railways of Suburban Glasgow with a new extension to Airdrie, the classic terminus of the North Clyde Line, in this new expansion for Train Simulator Classic.

name: Beasts From Beyond
description: Unearthly beasts have invaded our world. Visit multiple locations to find portals that work as a pathway from their world to ours. Use your equipment to your advantage and seal the connection to their world for good.

name: Armechgeddon
description: Armechgeddon is a chaotic action rogue-lite with a minimalist control scheme. Pick the right mech and pilot for the job, and lay waste to hundreds of enemies with your custom arsenal.

name: Dinodon
description: A huge monster got into a residential city and destroys entire neighborhoods! All the military equipment of the city is put against him, but nothing can save them. from the fire of an angry monster.

name: Chicken Fight
description: Chickens, baseball bats and rockets, need more? Fight other player chickens in a fast-paced platformer fighter where you use the environment to defeat your enemies. Pick up fishing rods, jetpacks, net guns, and even other chickens. Also defeat an evil duck in story mode or create maps in the editor.

name: The Devourer: Hunted Souls
description: Play as a paranormal investigator in our hybrid between first person survival and psychological horror game. Investigate a haunted forest with up to 5 players CO-OP vs AI and try to lift the curse. The forest is active... time may run out. Will you survive or will you lose your soul?

name: Speedway Ringer
description: Speedway Ringer is a top-down racer inspired by American stock car oval racing and the real-life challenges of Motorsports. Drivers will need a balance of aggression and patience to perfect their technique and succeed in a chaotic online multiplayer environment.

name: AnimuJump
description: A short anime jump game where you just jump and... well jump

name: Granny Escape
description: This poor little granny needs to get out of her retirement home, but they just won't let her out! The thing is, she's not very fast with her walker, so she'll need to be sneaky to pass through staff, cameras and all kinds of security and escape!

name: Bedrock High
description: A beat 'em up RPG adventure! Fight for your pride, meet interesting characters and solve the mysteries of Bedrock High!

name: Demolition Inc.: Level & Weapon
description: Play the brand new “Back to Work” campaign with 21 new levels. Unleash the chaos with 3 new special destruction tools. Make cars fly, control swarms of cars and start asteroid hails. Unlock 10 new achievements. Do all this with the freshly updated Demolition Inc.

name: Oba Doba
description: Oba Doba is a Roguelike RTS that is fast, funny, and frantic. Defend your base with towers and fighters while managing your resources and upgrades. Build up your arsenal of structures, abilities, and passives to defeat the evils that await. Build, rebuild, and survive!

name: Shadow of Scintilla
description: Hack and slash your way through hordes of monsters with fluid movement system including wall run, mantle and grapple in this action rogue-like. Master melee and range weapons with customizable combos. Reject or embrace your inner beast. And discover the secrets of this dark fantasy world.

name: Valkyria Chronicles 4: A Captainless Squad
description:
Winter, 1935 EC. Squad E, traveling now aboard the snow cruiser Centurion, notices one day that rescue dog Ragnarok has gone missing. Feeling guilty for neglecting him, members of Squad E sneak out to find the lost pup.

This story can be played after completing Chapter 10 of the main story. To access this story, go to Book Mode > Menu > Extra Stories."

name: Paper Planes
description: Take your role as protector and defend your assets from enemy squadrons or engage in devastation as the attacker. Fly with the best PaperPlane pilots in the world in hand crafted parks with an abundance of enemies to destroy. PaperPlanes is an Arcade team-flight-sim, base defender and battleroyale.

name: Owlman
description: The following is a series of tapes recovered near the Overlook National Park where four people were recently reported missing- a family of three and one motorist.

name: Vessel Blue
description: In this Point & Click Puzzle Horror Game, you sit at a desk trying to solve puzzles using your old computer, whilst being hunted by a terrifying monster. You can’t run away or walk in this game; you are stuck to your chair!

name: Blood Rot: 1918
description: Blood Rot: 1918 has players fighting against hordes of the undead in the midst of The Great War. Survive solo, or with friends in this first-person zombie shooter.

name: Blightlands Blacksmith
description: Blightlands Blacksmith is a medieval fantasy blacksmithing simulator with exploration and combat elements. Mine, smelt, forge, assemble, grind, and rune-craft weapons to supply a legion cohort, and defend yourself as you delve into the mine for new materials. The cohort's success depends on you.

name: Atomic Surf
description: Atomic Surf is a VR supported retro arcade shooter where you ride a rocket through lush, challenging landscapes and blast your way through hordes of alien droids with an arsenal of futuristic weapons. Fight solo or with a friend in full campaign co-op.

name: King of the Road
description: We present to your attention the classic 2D racing with a top view

name: Don't Flee
description: Don't Flee - is a psychological horror-thriller, all the actions of which take place in an old abandoned school, wherethe player finds himself to save his brother. However, soon he realizes that everything he sees is not true...

name: Growth
description:
Growth is a cozy, hex grid based soft-strategy game. Explore and populate a procedurally generated world by utilizing the unique abilities of animals. Growth blends the beauty of cozy exploration with challenging navigation around obstacles such as mountains and rivers to populate fertile soil, transforming barren landscapes into lush forests, meadows, and more. Experience an unforgettable mix of discovery and strategy. Start growing your own idyllic landscape!

Explore and expand an ever-growing, procedurally generated map by cleverly connecting clusters of wildlife. Claim newfound clusters or points of interest to receive additional wildlife or in some cases special rewards. As you expand the landscape you will discover new types of animals, providing unique abilities to overcome obstacles. Whether you're looking for a quick break from work or a relaxed puzzle session, Growths' intuitive gameplay lets you explore a beautiful landscape, tile by tile.

name: Soul Guardians
description: Soul Guardians is a 2D cross-scroll action RPG game. Hired as a mercenary of the Empire, the protagonist goes on a journey to stop the conspiracy of the Dark Forces Undertaker. Raising unique characters, collecting and combining chain arts to enjoy your own hot action!

name: Battle of Guardians
description: Forgotten Guardians returned to save humanity from a demonic invasion. Battle of Guardians, is a real-time online multiplayer PVP and PVE free-to-play fighting game.

name: Last Whisper
description: The only way to play the Last Whisper game is to survive. The more you explore the open world, the more you will need to acquire better gear as everything in the game wants you dead

name: Desolation
description: Unravel the mysteries of an abandoned city in Desolation, a multiplayer horror game. Your quest is to locate the source of a massive EMF output deep in the city. The shadows seem to be alive and stalking you as you progress deeper. What started as an investigation becomes a fight for survival.

name: Tales of: Sena
description: What does a lonely soul do, beyond the life that we know? Does it move on? Does it stay? Or does it enter the afterlife?

name: Vincent's Horror Story
description: In Vincent's Horror Story, players are immersed in a spine-chilling and bizarre atmosphere teeming with frightening monsters and mind-bending challenges.

name: Deltatile
description: Deltatile is a puzzle game based on a unique tile swapping mechanic, featuring 6 different worlds and over 65 levels.

name: Resoraki
description: Resoraki is a simple racing game. Play alone or with a friend (offline/online) and race in Poland, Finland, Australia or Greece. Different modes game like championship, arcade and time trial. The graphics combine anime, cartoon and comic styles.

name: MotoGP 14: Moto2 and Moto3
description: This free of charge additional content completes Moto2 and Moto3 rosters of the game.

name: The Voidness
description: The Voidness is a Sci-fi psychological horror game where it takes place inside the void where it's filled with just gloom - the only way to see is by scanning the environment with your range finder device, however you are not alone. Don't breathe ... as they are listening.. and watching.

name: Anipocalypse
description: Anipocalypse is a humoristic post-apocalyptic first-person shooter. Use an arsenal of guns to shoot your way through hordes of zombies and mutated animals to complete your mission in this first-person "bullet-hell" shooter!

name: Tartarus Longo Itinere
description: Tartarus is a DungeonCrawler in Card format that will drop you into the fiery Inferno. Use your skills to kill as many creatures as possible and successfully pass the Mephisto's test... The Long Itinere.

name: HexLands
description: HexLands is a turn-based, roguelike city builder, set on peaceful, procedural medieval islands. Settle as many islands as possible, as they are getting less and less habitable! Manage your resources, complete quests, use special tools and synergize perks! How far will your empire reach?

name: The Feathered Serpent
description: The Feathered Serpent is a 2d action-platformer with randomly generated levels, enemies, and items! It has heavy Roguelite elements, a progression system granting permanent upgrades, and many items and weapons that change how you attack.

name: Dice is the Way
description: Dice is the Way is a deck builder roguelike card game with a twist: you can change ANY number on the screen when you using the Roll The Dice card. Roll the dice, this is the way.

name: Mother
description: When included in the Mother 1+2 bundle, Mother (Earthbound Beginnings in the West) received an exclusive equippable item, the Easy Ring, available from the start, which makes the game more balanced (therefore easier than the original version).

name: Rubblar
description: Time to grab everything you can!

name: Pedestal
description:
One month ago, Cosmos Girls' Academy student Shiori Natsume was found dead on campus.

Though rumor spreads that it was suicide, Aoi Ooe of the newspaper club wants to know if that's really true.

Accompanied by her friend Akari, she begins an investigation to uncover the truth - no matter what may come of it.

name: Somber
description:
It's been 30 years since the mysterious abandonment of the R.R.C Titan, a giant factory ship orbiting around a dying star. What was once a technological powerhouse, creating the most intelligent and sturdy robots, made to replace humans in tasks that demand lot's of back breaking labor and complex calculations, is now a rotting wreck floating aimlessly around its star.

While the company and its founder were always a source of controversy, nobody has claimed any sort of attack on the facility. Making the sudden abandonment all the more mysterious.

You awaken on board this ship, not knowing who you are or how you got there.

You get an incoming message from a humanoid robot named Rick, who tells you that the robots on the ship have become self sustained and will kill any intruders.
He can help you escape, if you help him in return.

Will you trust Rick?

name: Crazy Maze
description: Have you challenged the real maze? Welcome to the 3D maze game, take you into a huge maze world to find a way out, we have carefully designed 12 labyrinths, one is bigger than one, one is harder than one!

name: Mother
description: The original Japanese version of EarthBound Beginnings, released only in Japan for the Famicom, had some gameplay, story and level layout differences from the later Western port. This original version was never released outside of Japan.

name: To Heart 2 Portable
description: To Heart 2 Portable is a port of the 2004 visual novel for the PlayStation Portable.

name: Chickie Catchers
description: Help Mocha and Butternut Squash catch the birdies from the treetops in this cute co-op physics game!

name: The Super Stoo-Pendous World of Dr. Seuss
description: Sin descripción

name: U.S. Youth Soccer: Power-Up Soccer
description: Featuring both boy and girl players out on the field, this family-oriented soccer game offers fast and fun play for the family.

name: Space Invaders
description: The arcade classic that spawned the golden age of video games has returned to your TV!

name: Sakura Succubus 7
description: After successfully wooing Stephania, the princess of Astoria, Hiroki takes her on a tour of Tokyo alongside Elizabeth, her maid, and Cosmos, the ditzy, airheaded e-girl. Things take a turn for the sinister, however, when somebody begins to stalk them…

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Illustrations
description: Puzzles of beautiful illustrations!

name: SBK 14: Official Mobile Game
description:
Race as the world’s elite riders in the official game of the 2014 eni FIM Superbike World Championship, and get ready for adrenaline-fueled racing action!

Featuring beautiful 3D graphics, SBK14 is the closest you can get to actually riding the most powerful bikes from the best motorcycle brands in the world.
Hug the turns and speed through real tracks around the globe!

name: Depths of Helheim
description: "Depths of Helheim" is a solo Action-RPG Adventure game, based on Norse mythology, explore the Nine Worlds and use your abilities to defend yourself from abominations.

name: While We Wait Here
description:
Share thoughts and hot food with your last ever clients, as you wait for the world to end.

Tackling themes of time, the armageddon and the intricacies of human psychology, While We Wait Here promises to be as deep as it does captivating, as players must juggle between the mundanity of flipping burger patties and pouring soda to the frighteningly serious threat that lies outside the diner’s doors.

name: Mythrera
description: Mythrera is a top-down action RPG where you play as Sammyla in a magical world filled with monsters, treasure, and adventure. Explore the vast realm of Mythrera as you fight your way through hordes of enemies, collect powerful gear, and complete quests to gain experience and level up.

name: Battlemon
description: Battlemon is a third-person shooter based on fast-paced skirmishes and dynamic map events. Until the last drop of juice!

name: HaHa
description: Our heroes are trapped in the universe of cartoon characters. This has not pleased the inhabitants. The creatures that have been living on their own for a long time certainly wouldn't want any visitors. Let's see if our heroes can escape from these unhappy hosts?

name: Focus
description: In this photography horror game, the player takes on the role of a budding photographer who is hired to document an abandoned, haunted mansion. The player's goal is to capture as many ghostly images as possible while exploring the creepy, creaky old mansion.

name: Lost Trials
description: Lost Trials is a Punishing Platformer, you charge your jumps and accurately estimate the charged timings to travel upwards as fast as possible. There is a running timer for speed running purposes and leaderboard records.

name: Chains of Time
description: In this 2D RPG, Rollo will have to become much more than a street urchin and care for the survival of all people, instead of only his own.

name: Heralds of Silence. Chapter one
description: Heralds of Silence is a first-person horror game. Solve complex puzzles, look for clues, dive into the darkness of empty corridors and, perhaps, you will discover the secrets of a mysterious scientific complex and the curse of the Silence.

name: Crucible
description: Dodge your way through the crucible of fire! Crucible is a 2D, high-action, top-down shooter game.

name: Vengeful Castle
description: Slaying enemies with swords and magic, break the endless cycle of revenge.

name: Helmetman
description: Enjoy a rouge-like deckbuilding card game and story at once! Helmetman, who was just an ordinary delivery guy, became a hero out of vengeance. He is shockingly ugly, but don't worry, since he always has his helmet on! You may be able to start a relationship... but... that probably won't happen...

name: The Guard
description: You are on the night shift at the mall. While you were taking your post, your partner went missing. All the time you hear some kind of noise. You need to find out their origin and find your partner. As you pass, you will need to find the keys and open locked rooms.

name: Endless Spaceship
description: Defend yourself from thousands of obstacles and enemies, the more points, the better placed in the world ranking!

name: Depths of Insanity
description: 3D First-Person Adventure with exploration and uncovering secrets of the areas surrounding your crash site.Collect all necessary materials to craft a temporary home and hopefully find a way to rebuild your Spacecraft and return home before it's too late.The Universe is in your hands!

name: Knight Cats: Leaves on the Road - Collector's Edition
description: Chaos takes hold when an unknown villain executes an evil plan in the small village of Catstown, and young Shavan gets caught up in the mystery only to find that he may be his beloved town's only hope!

name: Peaks of Yore
description: Travel around The Great Gales to climb challenging peaks in this physics-based climbing adventure set in 1887. Meet like-minded mountaineers, unlock helpful climbing gear, and become a pioneer of mountaineering.

name: Aircraft Infinity
description: We present you a fun simulation game in which you pilot an aircraft and have the mission to destroy parts of a large asteroid that has broken into millions of pieces and is heading towards Earth.

name: Mahjong Egyptian: The Mystery of the Pharaoh
description: The game Mahjong Egyptian: The Mystery of the Pharaoh is made in the style of the greatest ancient civilizations. When traveling from one Egyptian sight to the other, you open a new level. Relax and enjoy this beautiful game! Your task is to find pairs of not closed identical shields and remove them from the board.

name: Froggie Jump
description:
Overcome all dangers and find your froggie girl.
Cute platformer game for players with nerves of steel. Find your froggie girl in each of the 12 unique levels in the shorters possible time.

Lead your frog hero on his oddyssey to save the froggie girl. Double jump using your air powered fan-cap and slow your falls.

name: Rogue, Rogue, Baby!
description: Rogue, Rogue, Baby! is a fun, frenetic and feel good roguelite. Grab a change of diapers and head out on an adventure!

name: Train Sim World 2: BR Class 52 'Western' Loco
description: Built to work top-link expresses, the BR Class 52 spent its days racing through BR’s Western Region and now enjoys retirement on heritage railways.

name: Dare to Spread
description: Dare to Spread; It is a turn-based strategy game in which we shape the course of the war by making important choices. In this strategy game you control rebel armies. We occupy enemy countries with our armies. We do illegal work to finance the army.

name: Mini Star Cafe
description: Mini Star Cafe is a Simple relaxing game that expands the store by making and selling Coffee & bread.

name: Tour de Force
description: In this unique racing game from 1987, take to the bike track to experience the thrills and excitement of international Grand Prix cycling. Contains both the Amstrad CPC and ZX Spectrum versions of the game.

name: Cartoonite
description: Choose your favorite vehicle from an infinite number of possibilities. Have fun crashing into objects to collect resources and build your own world. Show your friends what you've built and do stunts with them.

name: Project: Summer Ice 5 - Ninja
description: Ninja duo Levi and Vanessa investigate the "Project: Summer Ice"...

name: Stivenelvro Legends
description: It is an adventure game, 2d platforms, where you control Stivenelvro, jump, turn, slide through different obstacles getting the keys that will unlock the legends and thus get more abilities. All this being guided by his friend GhostPower and his machine to teleport him to different worlds.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty is a historical fantasy action role-playing video game developed by Team Ninja and published by Koei Tecmo.

Set during a fictionalised version of the fall of the Han Dynasty, the plot follows an unnamed protagonist who battles historical characters and Chinese mythological creatures corrupted by demonic qi.

The Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty (full game)
- Digital Art Book
- Digital Mini Soundtrack
- Season Pass (which includes additional DLCs Battle of Zhongyuan, Conqueror of
Jiangdong, Upheaval in Jingxiang, and Season Pass Bonus Qinglong Armor)

name: Panzer Paladin: Challenge Core
description: Challenge Core: Content Update for Panzer Paladin Includes: A new Challenge Mode with 11 rooms to truly test your skills, Speedrun replay and leaderboard now available for all new rooms, Brand New Classic 8-bit Soundtrack Option + Blacksmith Weapons Storage Increased.

name: Kirin Come
description: Kirin Come is a Sci-fi comedy Visual Novel. Help Rachel Reid and her charming partner Mary find their happiness somewhere among the cold vacuum of space!

name: Revenge
description: Revenge is a true survival horror experience that aims to show the most terrifying monster of all is the human mind.

name: My Defense Story
description: My Defense Story mixing Tower Defense and Roguelike together to provide a new game experience. In the game, you need to manage your troops, build your tower and defense from random enemies.

name: Revive & Prosper
description: A voxel automation game where you'll enjoy deep technical challenges and detailed simulations. Extract resources, construct an advanced automated base using belts and smart water control, and manage complex production chains. Whether you prefer to chill and build at your own pace or ramp up the difficulty by facing off against enemies, the choice is yours. Revive the land and master resource management to build the ultimate spaceport and launch into the stars.

name: Nature Puzzle
description:
Nature Puzzle is here!

Play various stages! Try different approaches! Choose and win different puzzle stages alone or with friends!

name: Z World Zombie: Death War
description:
Z World Zombie Death War is the ultimate 2D game in zombie survival.
Caught in the midst of an epic zombie outbreak in an unknown city, your only thought is: Survive!
In this game, players are tasked with fighting off a zombie invasion and reaching the subway to escape the city.

name: Groove Coaster: Wai Wai Party!!!! - Vocaloid Pack 8
description:
A DLC pack for GROOVE COASTER WAI WAI PARTY!!!! that includes 10 Vocaloid songs, navigators, and avatars!

This pncludes the following content.
■Song Pack (10 songs)
- Colorful Marine Snow / Carlos Hakamada Saize P
- SnowMix♪ / marasy
- EgoRock / Three
- Reincarnation Apple / PinocchioP
- Hare wo matsu / Orangestar
- Nyanyanyanyanyanyanya! / DaniwellP
- Torinokocity / 40mP
- PaⅢ.SENSATION / Yunosuke
- Paradichlorobenzene / Garuna(OwataP)
- ???(Secret)

■Navigator
- Snow Miku (SNOW MIKU 2022) *with voice
- Snow Miku (SNOW MIKU 2023) *with voice

■Avatar
- Snow Miku (2D, SNOW MIKU 2022)
- Rabbit Yukine(2D, SNOW MIKU 2022)
- Snow Miku (2D, SNOW MIKU 2023)
- Rabbit Yukine(2D, SNOW MIKU 2023)

name: Kingdoms of Ereloth
description: Kingdoms of Ereloth (KoE) is a Survival RPG video game, inspired by a fantastic medieval era where, thanks to its multiplayer system, you can immerse yourself with your friends in a vast world full of adventures. Forge strategic alliances with other factions to strengthen your kingdom and weaken the enemy, thus changing the fate of Ereloth.

name: Wheelie King 5
description: Online & Offline modes Customize bikes. Upgrade bikes. Wheelies, Endos, Real stunts & Drifting. Manual & Automatic gears.

name: Lord of Empires
description: Lord of Empires is a strategy game whose essence is to control the troops that you can send to capture the enemy.

name: V-Hunter Puzzler DX
description: Hunt a plethora of monsters using unique items in a dynamic turn-based grid puzzler! Complete the bite-sized levels in as few turns as possible and help V-Hunter defeat the evil vampire Alric!

name: Bit.Trip Collection
description: Venture with CommanderVideo on incredible journey through 8-bit classics! Experience various game modes and controlls inspired by retro arcade games, and win each level with epic beat in the background! Now in a 6-in-1 bundle!

name: Fear & Fury
description: Either fight against the monster inside, or give in and embrace your dark power. In Crimson City, The City of The Cursed every choice will impact both the story and how you play.

name: Tiger Tank 59 I: A-Gun MP040
description: This DLC contains the Map No.216-220.

name: Nine Rounds Rapid
description: A fast paced, super stylized, roguelike, twin stick shooter. Nine levels of designed, hand painted and procedurally generated, punchy and punky fast mayhem in a uniquely stunning attitude filled world.

name: Goblr: Goblin Date Night Simulator
description: A bite-sized visual novel about going on dates with some absolutely disastrous goblins.

name: IGKnight
description: Explore a defined mystical world where magic can be harnessed in the form of Runes. Start as an adventuring knight, and build your skills to become a powerful sorcerer. Go on Quests that are catered to the skills you advance. Use the runes to aid you in combat, crafting , and survival!

name: Monsters Idle RPG
description: Explore the world of Arcadius - a place filled with many types of mythical creatures - manage your creatures, items, capital, other resources and capture all creatures by battling in diverse biomes and places.

name: Kaleidoscope Chateau
description: Unpack the past and deny the future in this first-person psychological horror about the perception of memory, time and the lengths we go to control these forces. Find your remaining possessions and say goodbye to your shining castle, your diamond home, your Kaleidoscope Chateau.

name: Innocent Critters
description: An online party game where 2-12 players venture into a procedurally generated forest in search of food. With supplies limited, you will have to decide who will make it out alive and who will not!

name: Farming World: Jam Factory
description: The Jam Factory DLC for Farming Wold lets you construct a brand new production facility that specialises in the creation of Jam goods.

name: Moki: The Escape
description: Moki wakes up in a strange environment. The only memory: the own name. A peaceful world... or is it?! Join Moki in a challenging 2.5D jump & run platformer with many puzzles. Meet lovable and sometimes oddball characters and experience a occasionally emotional story.

name: Fingerspelling Unleashed: BANZSL Edition
description: Fingerspelling Unleashed: BANZSL Edition focuses on teaching you the two handed sign language alphabet of the British/Australian/New Zealand hearing impaired communities.

name: The Pub Simulator
description: When you are a middle age single man on a shitty job with all your dreams faded away, there is only one choice. Open a bar! It is pub simulator game where you can build a pub, make new friends and drunk them to death.

name: Thalassic
description: Thalassic is a VR underwater horror survival game where you explore an planet a few thousand years after its evacuation. Explore the depths of this new world ocean with your capsule communicator George. Encounter different creatures as you go deeper and find what lurks down in the depths.

name: Hexagonal Explods
description: Hexagonal Explods is a vertical shoot 'em up game where you need to defend the earth from aliens. Collect power ups, fight funny bosses and... well... SHOOT THEM UP!

name: Welcome to Levy
description: All the women in Levy have disappeared. Why did they leave in bare feet? Discover their story along with 680 CGs and 11 unique endings in this apocalyptic visual novel.

name: EbiTapes
description: Go on an adventure to meet fun new friends, help them out, and create delicious beats along the way! Record the sounds of the world and make your own cool music.

name: Explorers
description: Explorers is an adventure RPG game for up to 2 players. Each player needs to explore, collect, manage shared resources to unlock new terrains, upgrade weapons to defeat the enemies, Bosses and save the Dwarves Hidden Kingdom!

name: A Land Goo's Crazy
description: A hard platformer roguelite game whit manny RNG. Upgrades, skill improvements, Area- and Bossfights.

name: Runa & the Chaikurú Legacy
description: Help the brave adventurer Runa uncover the mysteries buried deep in the Ruins of the ancient Chaikurú civilization, in a classic and epic 3D action-adventure game. Explore a fantasy world inspired by South-American locations, nature and cultures.

name: Miami Horizon 2077
description: GTA cop chase if it was a 2D arcade . Drive your way through the street of miami in 2077 in style.Buy upgrades, cars , collect power-ups and battle your way out like a real-badass.

name: Sin Breaker Rig
description: Experience fast-paced action in VR without a controller! Dodge bullet, dodge bullet in mid-air, shoot fireballs or facepalm an robot. Immerse yourself in an anime world and obliterate your foes in the most intuitive way.

name: Take a Little
description: Smash-Bros like action multiplayer game where you consume your fellow food in a hectic city scape. Become the last winning food on top and claim your crown. Movement is similar to Joust and will how you gliding around with a jetpack while dodging opponent advances.

name: Deaded
description: Build your defences, scavenge for loots and survive the zombie infested city saturated with a mysterious fog. Survivors will ask for help but its up to you to save them, or leave them for dead. How long will you survive before you become... Deaded...

name: Across the Wilds
description: Immerse yourself in the fascinating world of off-road delivery of various cargoes. You will face harsh challenges, powerful off-road vehicles and many challenging tasks as a courier. Create your own business: fulfill contracts, earn rewards, upgrade your personal SUV alone or with friends.

name: Maybe Tomorrow
description: "Maybe Tomorrow" is a casual game in which the player drags the stars in the night sky with a mouse and brighten up the sky. Form constellations with stars and learn about Andrew, who has a habit of saying "maybe tomorrow"

name: Urban Flow: Platinum Edition
description: This bundle includes base game, Winter Expansion Pack and London Rules.

name: Poolcore
description: Poolcore is an atmospheric game about liminal poolrooms. Jump into the water, solve puzzles and roam freely in these eerily comforting rooms.

name: Dragon Dodge Valley
description: An intense, bullet hell, arcade style game with old school mechanics and art. Fast action, dodging fireballs and waves of enemies while aiming accurately. Can you survive dragon dodge valley?

name: Flee the Backrooms
description: This game is a multiplayer & team-based horror themed survival game. Your task as the hazmat team is to complete a backup of all computers and survive in the backrooms. Get ready to witness the events taking area in the first command center inside the backrooms from your own eyes.

name: The Meme Hunter
description: The Meme Hunter is a dynamic first–person shooter in which you will exterminate crowds of evil memes. They're everywhere. They're out for your blood. They will follow you wherever you go…

name: Land Drifters
description: Land Drifters is an incremental RPG game that can be played idle or active. Explore islands, unlock new skills and combat classes, overcome obstacles, and more! The game is jam-packed with many paths of progression intertwined throughout the game!

name: Insomnia
description: A 3D "Survive the night" Horror Game played through the perspective of a father who wants to free his daughter from a powerful demon.

name: The Fabric of the Mind
description: "The Fabric of the Mind" is a difficulty, but rewarding game. The Game is structured into multiple acts that take the player through different creative ideas, sometimes painful gameplay and a lot of deaths. And all of that in complete Black and White.

name: Shadows of the Night
description: There is a war coming. Pallas joined the Fortress out of his sense of duty towards protecting his country and most importantly to him, his family, and will soon realize that to truly protect them he will have to abandon it all.

name: Turn on the Lights Carefully
description: A minimalist puzzle game about connecting and disassembling circuits.

name: Limbs
description: Limbs is a one to two player dexterity game where you take control over the limbs of a string puppet. Immerse yourself in a handcrafted world where moving each limb individually makes for challenging but rewarding and hilarious gameplay.

name: Semmelweis
description: Narrative game about the life of Ignace Semmelweis, a visionary doctor who has saved thousand of lives of mothers in the 19e century.

name: OMSI 2: Steam Edition - AI-Articulated Bus for Vienna
description: A preview for the latest Vienna add-on including articulated buses, the AI articulated bus GU 240:The GU 240 M18 (= “Regular bus with underfloor engine, 240 hp and 18 m long”) is an Austrian custom construction by ÖAF Gräf&Stift and Steyr-Daimler-Puch for Wiener Linien.

name: The Offering
description: The Offering is a 1-4 player co-op psychological horror. You enter the halls of a roaming evil spirit, and the only way to survive is to gather the haunted artefacts quickly, using the equipment at your disposal. Work together as you explore the halls, where every turn could be your last.

name: Legion of Judgment: Fallen Angel
description: Legion of Judgment is a Noir action-RPG Metroidvania game that offers a new and deeper player experience. Explore forgotten memories to become stronger, manage a hotel in reality to create a powerful legion and win the war against werewolf guild.

name: Kenchana: Oath of a Magical Spear
description: 3d beatemup with South East Asia Archipelago theme

name: Mechanode
description: An all-action, story-driven metroidvania that confronts the darkest realities of existence and the dawning of consciousness.

name: Heli-Cats
description:
Dual elevation horizontal 2D arcade shoot 'em up co-op helicopter action!

With the world facing a desperate energy and economic crisis, rogue forces have launched a coordinated assault on a weakened allied order. Unable to respond directly under the fragile political climate, the Joint Security Alliance has turned to a special helicopter squadron known as the Heli-Cats. Their mission is to repel the invaders under the guise of a local paramilitary unit such that all actions can be disavowed should things go wrong.

name: Slayser
description: Kill enemies while surviving endless waves. Buy new weapons and defenses to improve your survivability. Survive as many waves as possible and set a record!

name: Hordebreak
description: Hordebreak is an open world survival crafting game with big guns and hordes of thousands of monsters. Play alone or with friends, explore the fallen world, build fortified fortresses, craft & upgrade badass gear, and fulfil your reconquest of this fallen world.

name: Come Home: Premium Edition
description: Come Home is a free game and will always be a free game, but this Premium Edition contains loads of extra content, receives updates before the free version, and is a great way to show your support for the game and its developer.

name: Lusty God
description: Lusty God is a puzzle game where you are a God that decided to create a whole world out of boredom. Explore lots of elements and make lots of interesting things to satisfy your lust! Let's start creating!

name: Better Me Tree
description: Better Me Tree is an interactive self help application that includes simple objectives that are spoken aloud by the user to promote daily positive reflection, motivation, encouragement and edification.

name: GoreBox
description: GoreBox is a chaotic physics-driven sandbox where creativity meets destruction. Use the Reality Crusher to spawn, manipulate, and obliterate anything. Customize, battle with friends, roleplay, or face devious creatures. In this world, your imagination rules—and chaos is your playground!

name: Solar Survivors
description: Build the ultimate space fighter as you uncover clever strategies and hidden synergies. Overcome weakness and slay hoards of rebels in order to defend your gods. Solar Survivors distills the deep strategy and progression of an RPG into quick, arcade-like sessions.

name: Mega City Force
description: Retrowave Action Roguelike featuring tough agents battling crime to the electrifying music of artists like Droid Bishop, Timecop1983, and more! Choose your agent and dive into hardcore action against enemies and bosses, utilizing a vast arsenal and special abilities that will define your playstyle

name: Yomaia
description: Experience the definitive survival experience on a open world full of dangers as you attempt to stay alive on an unforgiving land inhabited by dinosaurs and mutants! Be the Hunter. Be the Survivor. Be the Prey.

name: Beeftown Beatdown
description: Wrestle, Cook and Date you opponents in this tasty combination of roguelite deck building game and visual novel! The Beeftown Beatdown Championship is wating for you!

name: Vampire Ascent
description: Vampire Ascent is a casual auto-battler real-time strategy survival game with rogue-lite elements where you play a vampire lord. Survive endless hordes of enemies and defend your castle by building your own vampire kingdom. Choose from a variety of traits and upgrades to create unique builds.

name: The Way of Joy
description: The Way of Joy reflects actual life, where you must fail so much to achieve success, complete the mission, and reach the "Joy" at the end of the goal.

name: Retropolis 2: Never Say Goodbye
description: The critically acclaimed VR adventure series is back! Get lost in a sci-fi mystery spanning over four all-new episodes. Engage a battle of the minds with a sick new villain and use only your wit, your hovering inventory, and a pair of extendo-arms to uncover the truth.

name: Baking Success
description: Join Fay on her Flying Bakery and travel the world, serving delicious baked goods in this challenging Time Management game!

name: Qualification as Rogue
description: A platformer combining fun controls and puzzles to solve traps

name: Project Chaos
description: Project Chaos Is An High Octane, Manic & Chaotic, Multiplayer First Person Shooter. Set In 2098, A Team Of Rebels, Activists & Terrorists Band Together With One Goal: To Insight Change. Their Method Of Choice? Chaos!

name: Limbo Revolution
description: Limbo Revolution is a dystopian adventure game set in an alternate 1990s Eastern European country ravaged by dictatorship. In this immersive world, you must navigate the desolate streets, political landscape and unravel the truth behind the downfall of the nation. Watch out for others.

name: Beetplanet
description: A small expeditionary group settled on a distant desert planet and discovered a huge army of invaders who decided to appropriate all natural resources for themselves. Your squad decides help the local population of the planet and protect them.

name: Core Crossing
description: First-person dungeon crawler RPG. Build your party and explore the labyrinth known as the "Core" under the Town of Melodiena. Successful adventurers shall be granted the town's coveted Revere License.

name: Seeker: Halina
description: Collection of free & paid, fully narrated visual novel which features a story rich, family friendly adventure in a fantasy world full of exciting Seeker species. The majestic cities and cozy villages are blooming – there is joy to share and mysteries to solve. Your journey starts here!

name: Raindrop Umbrella
description: Sometimes to attack, sometimes to move. Kick your enemies to the ground with umbrella actions. A devastated land. Two opposing races. What is the secret of the world where it keeps raining? ...... A short 2D action game drawn with dots.

name: Blood Bottom
description: Blood Bottom is a Survival Horror sandbox, Lovecraftian themed and an industrial ambience on the shores of a secluded coastal town, in the bowels of a mysterious factory where the protagonist will have to escape from a living nightmare that is linked to his own existence and why he is there.

name: Felvidek
description: Find out what unlikely events take place in this alternate history region of Slovak Highlands. This land is ravaged by Hussite pillagers and Ottoman spies while surreal horrors dwell in the dark. It's now up to Pavol, a fair knight with alcohol problems, to gather a party and stop those who oppose our kingdom.

name: Player's Eleven: A Football Manager Game
description: A football manager like there has never been before. Play Player's Eleven the way you want, as a youth coach, sports director, head coach or club director. Choose your role and lead your club to titles and glory.

name: Haru: The Armada of the Astral Void
description: Help Haru defeat the armada of the astral void in a fast-paced roguelite retro space shooter.

name: Loretta's Brand New Job
description: Loretta's husband Elio has started a promising new job at a newspaper. However, a politician Elio used to work with is now coercing Elio to write positive articles about him, putting Elio's reputation at risk. To protect her husband, Loretta begins to look into this man's past...

name: Balls & Beats
description: Balls & Beats is a colorful and casual game where you automatically jump to the beat of the music.

name: Qwerty Quest
description: Type your way to the top of the leaderboard as an epic Wordslayer! Perfect for anyone serious about improving their typing speed and accuracy in a fun, educational way.

name: Ebola Village
description: Ebola Village - this is a classic survival horror game from the 90s with a focus on atmosphere and player immersion. Solve puzzles, follow the story carefully and use various weapons in a brutal fight for survival. Danger lurks at every turn.

name: Extreme Typer
description:
Strike your keyboard to attack the monsters!
Challenge your typing speed!
Rarely seen, Extreme Typer is a typing game bringing you joy while increasing your typing speed!
You wanna type English faster?
Playing Extreme Typer is the way to go!
There are quests to conquer and stage bosses to slay
Monsters won’t be standing around. They will test your concentration and visual
skills by various movements.
Each boss has a different super power to make the typing more challenging.
Each time after you play, your speed and accuracy will display.
You will know exactly how far you’ve gone.
Before you know it, you’ll be typing at super speed!

name: Astronaut Training
description:
Learn to use the Manned Maneuvering Unit in the Neutral Buoyancy Lab swimming pool.
Think Spacewalking and floating in Space is easy? Here you can find out if you have what it takes to master inertial flight.

name: Stick Cricket 2
description: Hit out or get out in the follow-up to the world's most popular cricket game, Stick Cricket!

name: Sally Can't Sleep
description: Sally Summers, an average Jill living in her apartment in L.A, has trouble getting to sleep one night. As it turns out, her favourite pillow needs some new feathers! Are you a bad enough dude to collect the feathers in this First-person Dream exploration Collectathon Platformer?

name: Seed Bash
description: "Seed Bash" is a local multiplayer game where players control oak seeds fighting for the perfect sprouting place. It's a fast-paced arena fighting game played with a gamepad.

name: DarkBlood Gaiden
description: At the end of the world, there was a tower soaring high into the sky. The tower was said to hold treasures that could grant wishes, attracting many adventurers, but none of them ever returned. The king sent a group of knights to investigate the tower.

name: Ink & Paper: DoodleCut
description:
Draw a line to enclose the area and doodle it.
Watch out for baddies who can catch you or cut your line!

name: Strawb
description: Find your way through challenging puzzles and catch your friend by clever movement and destruction of blocks.

name: The Horror of Secret Experiments
description: You are one of the surviving scientists. Your task is to find a laptop with data on experiments and get out of the laboratory.

name: Dirty Mind
description: Mike is trapped in his own nightmare and needs to survive to wake up. just like in real life if Mike runs out of his medicine he will start to see strange things, so he must manage his resources well

name: Ultratoro 2
description: Drive at full speed in donut-shapped worlds while monstrous entities try to destroy you. Your car is a hacking device, capable of stealing from Megacorporations in cyberspace.

name: Turbo Racing
description: Turbo Racing is an arcade motorsport drift racing game filled with driving fun and a healthy competitive spirit. Take part in racing races and choose one of 12 different racing cars.

name: Legends of Celestite: The All Bearer
description: Fate unites a new group of heroes as an unstoppable supervillain resurrects from the dead. During his war-filled resurgence, he discovers the peculiar birth of a red-eyed boy whom he believes to be more than just a prophecy in this story-driven RPG influenced by Naruto and The Legend of Dragoon.

name: Neko-chan's Club
description: In the Neko-chan's Club, you can meet girls for any taste! Sports tennis player? Or maybe a mysterious ninja girl? Do you like an insatiable Egyptian woman..? Be careful with the last one, she hasn't seen a man for a thousand years! Become a club member with Neko-chans!

name: Run Gun ZR
description: A new take on the Infinite Runner, now in VR. Dodge, Jump, and Vault with both hands as you make your way through infinite obstacles and Zombies. Unlock more weapons to help you progress further. How far will you go?

name: Mahjong: Legacy of the Toltecs
description: Become the best mahjong player in the world in the great mahjong game "Mahjong Legacy of the Toltecs"! Search for an ancient, powerful artifact that will help you find incredible treasures. Overcome obstacles, collect magical mana and become a legendary adventurer.

name: Vagrant Knight
description: Vagrant Knight is a topdown challenging action roguelike with elegant hack-n-slash combat with spell casting. Mow down and clear each room of demonic spawns to level up your character with unique melee attacks and spells. Try different combination of special attacks and spell in each level.

name: Roll Freak
description: Drag to move, hold to stop, charge to sprint. In danger, hold nearby hackable machines to make a way out.

name: The Crimping
description: A first-person horror game based on one of America's most haunted hotels. Use your wits and reflexes to escape supernatural encounters within Oregon's underground "Shanghai Tunnels."

name: Foad
description: Foad is a competitive party game featuring explosive devices with a thirst for chaos and destruction.

name: Cities in Motion 2: Metro Madness
description: Ever wanted to have a shorter metro for the night time, or a very long version for the rush hour? Well, now it's possible! The Metro Madness pack features customizable metro trains that you can put together car by car and alter the setup for different timetables.

name: Super Robot Wars 30: DLC 2
description: DLC 2 includes 9 additional playable units and 13 additional missions.

name: Generation N: Identity Included
description: "Generation N: Identity Included" is a 2D puzzle platformer. You as an AI will complete levels and help your creator with life decisions

name: CometStriker DX
description: CometStriker DX is an arcade action shooter featuring dodging, strategic power-ups and intense boss fights!

name: Wildwood: A Town Building Game
description: Build and grow your own colony in Wildwood, a thrilling town building game. Gather resources, craft tools, and expand your settlement with a robust logistics network. Start small and watch your colony thrive as you take control and guide it to greatness. Join the adventure now!

name: Murder is Game Over: Streaming Death
description: Embark on a thrilling pixel art adventure with Detective Guy & Cleo as they solve a mysterious murder. Explore an eerie seaside village, search for clues, interview suspects, and unravel the truth in this whodunit mystery.

name: Zombie Survivals 18+
description: Zombie Survivals 18+ is a blend of top-down shooter and visual novel. The world of the game is the ruins of the city after the zombie apocalypse. The enemies are hordes of zombies who want to kill the main character.

name: Trainz: A New Era - Bidye Traction Railroad
description: The BiDye Traction Railroad shows off the versatility of Trainz: A New Era by creating a virtual model railroad for you to explore and enjoy inside a large garage.

name: Dead Island: Zombie Hunter
description: An oasis island originally rich in resources, due to the attack of the virus, everyone was infected with the mutated virus, and the whole island was full of the breath of death... How do you defeat these zombies when you are the only survivor on the dead island? Can you survive?...

name: Chernobyl: Death May Die
description: You have to plunge into the psychological horror, where you have to solve puzzles and find a way out of Chernobyl. Weird, crazy and unique horror awaits you.

name: Bottoms Up!: Part 1
description: The most intoxicating story you will ever read... Literally! Bottoms Up! - is a linear Visual Novel type of game that only aims to present compellingly an interesting fantasy world, colorful characters and the largely funny, but sometimes dark shenanigans they get into.

name: Save the Girls
description: Welcome to a world full of fun and sex! ! Protect cute girls from danger! When you successfully protect them they will dedicate their bodies! Come and find the girls' secret garden! Happiness is waiting for you ahead!

name: Galactic Gladiators
