description: "Galactic Gladiators" is a 2D top-down shooter where you control a spaceship battling against enemy forces. Choose cards for unique abilities, collect crystals to upgrade, and defeat bosses to progress. Test your combat skills in this thrilling game.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham DLC - The Squad
description: A mysterious figure has infiltrated Belle Reve Penitentiary.

name: Volleydolls
description: Volleydolls is addictive, fresh and full of action - The colorful graphics seem to pop from the screen. It’s a whole new way to experience volleyball anywhere you are!

name: DunkDog Dreams
description: Fast paced run style game where you avoid defenders and obstacles as you make your way down the court. Learn to spin dribble around your opponents or split the defenders to avoid fouling. You can Shoot or Dunk at the side hoops for extra points and throw down your best dunk at the final hoop to complete the level.

name: Ski Jump 18
description: Ski jump is a retro ski jumping game with 55 different ski jumping hills from K50 to K250.

name: LEGO Batman 3: Beyond Gotham - Bizarro
description: To help save his planet from the evil Darkseid, Bizarro clones the Justice League and creates his own Bizarro League.

name: Erannorth Chronicles: Untold Tales and Legends
description: Experience a richer, more distinct, and dangerous world with the fourth Erannorth Chronicles expansion. "Untold Tales and Legends" will expand the world seamlessly with new Narrative Events, Challenges, Enemies, and Cards.

name: Vacuum Warrior
description: Vacuum Warrior is a Free to Play incremental idle game. Listen to the crisp crackle of dust and debris entering your vacuum as you vacuum ridiculous amounts of dust. Upgrade your vacuums, idle gains, and robot vacuums, earn achievements, and explore numerous locations in the Vacuum Warrior universe!

name: Broken Blade: Airgetlam
description: Sin descripción

name: Hareraiser: Prelude
description: Sin descripción

name: Instinct
description: Instinct is a die & retry oriented platformer with intense combat.

name: Snafu
description: Alibaba, the caretaker of the Medieval Grow your Business Game notices a Glitch or Virus of some sort called Snafu has infiltrated the game files. NPCs begin to act strangely, textures look off, and I think - I think something is trying to hunt me down?

name: Lie of Caelum: Episode 2 - Spirit
description: Experience the continent of Karsand, as well as continue Caelum's story with additional main characters. Discover more mysteries surrounding Flow Energy, and fight through those who dare abuse its power!

name: I Spy Spooky Mansion
description: Through the creaking gate, you'd best beware. A spooky mansion awaits...Enter if you dare! In I SPY: Spooky Mansion Deluxe a mischievous skeleton traps you inside her spooky mansion challenging you to find the secret way out. Explore a mysterious old house full of puzzles and mysteries!

name: Sink or Swim
description:
Sink or Swim, a puzzle and logic game from 1993. The game was released by the British studio Zeppelin Games. Sink or Swim was created for Amiga, PC, SNES.

The action game takes place on the SS Lucifer. Unexpectedly, the ship was sinking. Your task is to save the scientists from the sinking ship. If the ship is drowned, you must evacuate, but these clever scientists are whisking away without order and composition. And you have to help them get out of this ship. For this purpose you have to use different levers, oxygen tanks, bombs etc. All you have to do is plan to save as many scientists as possible.

name: Solium Infernum: Rectification
description:
Solium Infernum: Rectification is a free mini expansion pack that brings new rules, mechanics and play elements to the game that pits you as an Archfiend with the ambition of ruling Hell.

The expansion content could be enabled before game creation and it added new rules, diplomatic options, manuscripts, rituals, relics, artifacts, praetors and legions.

name: Ancient Bricks
description: Ancient Bricks is a brick breaker game. You have to journey through an ancient temple, collecting as many treasures as you can. You can either explore the temple's chambers through 240 handcrafted levels or venture below into the mine where the deeper you get the more precious treasures you will find! If you feel being skilled enough, you may dare venture into the darkest tombs where another 192 levels with lots of challenges await you.

name: Lemmings
description:
A unique mind-boggling game of multiple skill levels. Take command of the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen. Featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

The Satellaview broadcast is a bit to bit replica of the Super Famicom version

name: Don't Give Up on Me!
description:
Don't Give Up on Me! is a romance-comedy visual novel about a simple love confession going wrong in the most unpredictable, absurd and insane ways ever imagined. Experience five different days in which Yorokobi Akihiko tries to confess to his crush, each one with their own plot and shenanigans.

In the end, will Akihiko manage to confess?

name: Spider's Web
description: A short RPG horror game about a girl who tries to untangle a tight knot in her life.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Hazy River
description: Hazy River is a mod created by atsuover and Rageminer, and as the GameBanana page says: "2 classic FNF Mods in 1 sexy(?) package!", merging Garcello and Annie into one remake mod. It counts with: remastered songs; previously unused assets; minor updates and new bonus content.

name: Those Darn Brothers!!!
description: 'Those Darn Brothers!' is a slice of life BL about bonding with family.

name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
description:
A Nightmare on Elm Street is an unreleased NES game based on the film of the same name. In the game, you played as Freddy Krueger and your goal was to murder all the teens who are attempting to find your bones.

The game was developed by Rare and planned to be published by LJN, however half way through development the game was scrapped and was restructured into a completely different game, possibly due to the dark nature of the game and Nintendo's strict guidelines from the time when it came to third party releases on the NES.

name: Tokio: Tokyo-to Dai 24-ku
description: Tokio: Tokyo-to Dai 24-ku of Tokyo is a sci-fi city simulator from Artdink, the company behind the A-Train economy sim series. Playing it will require careful planning, improvisation, and correspondence with your city's constituents to fix problems and make everyone happy. You can personally telephone residents to hear their opinions, or even tune in on various TV channels to survey Tokio. Every little counts: your political party platform, the techno-industrial automation needed to power Tokio & its economy, and even space tourism via space shuttles and other programs—among others! Elements like artificial gravity, weather control, and orbital mining can also make or break your term as mayor, so manage it all to the best of your ability.

name: Parasomnia
description: Parasomnia is a first-person horror in VHS format, your task is to get out alive! You are not a fighter, you can only run. In Parasomnia you have to make a choice where to turn, each choice will depend on what will be waiting for you on the other side

name: Viper
description: Viper is a 1-player arcade game for Apple II in which you control the viper. The player's goal is to eat a mouse that appears on the screen.

name: 2048 Pool with Dido Angel
description: This crazy game of pool is like no other, play balls against equal values to combine them and move up a level. As each ball multiplies new ones are released, and eventually you'll unlock the full striptease!

name: Asari Nanami's Star Fishing
description: Sin descripción

name: Nonogram.com
description: Nonogram.com is an addictive picture cross puzzle with a vast collection of griddlers. Challenge your mind with this easy-to-play number puzzle from a top developer, and become a real Nonogram master! Join nonogram puzzle players all around the world, use logic to reveal pixel art pictures, and have fun!

name: Hitman 3: VR Access
description: Death Awaits. Agent 47 returns in HITMAN 3, the dramatic conclusion to the World of Assassination trilogy.

name: Hitman 3 Access Pass: Hitman - Complete First Season
description: The HITMAN 3 Access Pass system allows you to access HITMAN 1 and HITMAN 2 locations in HITMAN 3, essentially making it possible to play all locations in the World of Assassination trilogy from within HITMAN 3.

name: Hanger
description:
Make your way through 23 levels by swinging across bottomless pits, through tight gaps and pushing through obstacles.

Hang to the ceiling by pressing Space and use the left and right arrow keys to build momentum.

name: Pac-Xon Hero Strikes Back!
description: Your goal is to fill the empty space and capture the monsters by building a wall around them. You can advance to the next level once 80% of the space is filled. Don't let the monsters touch you, and try to get the power-ups that appear randomly around the screen.

name: Bucky O'Hare
description: Bucky O'Hare stars the titular rabbit as the captain of the Righteous Indignation, which protects the parallel universe of the Aniverse. His other crew members, duck Dead-Eye, cat Jenny, android Blinky, and human Willy, have been captured by the Toad Air Marshall. The first four levels take place on the Green, Red, Blue, and Yellow Planets, where the crew members are imprisoned. The player starts out with Bucky, and the other kidnapped crew members are playable once rescued and have different abilities and weapons. After all the members are saved, the Toad Air Marshall then kidnap the Righteous Indignation again in the Magnum Tanker. The remainder of the game involves the crew members saving each other, blowing up the Magnum Tanker and escaping.

name: RaceCraft
description: Don't you wish you could build your own crazy stunt courses? Now you can with RaceCraft! Drive like thunder on your light-powered tracks in the universe's coolest cars. Time to put your crafting and racing skills to the test! Do you have what it takes to be a RaceCraft champion?

name: The Astonishing Captain Skull
description: A mysterious death on a planet full of ghosts draws the investigative powers of the amazing Captain Skull.

name: Overload: Community Level Pack
description: Revival Productions presents a collection of curated community levels to extend and expand your Overload experience. The creators, who receive half the proceeds from the sale of this DLC, are members of the Overload Community who have used the free Overload Level Editor to make new levels. The Community Level Pack features a nine-level story-driven campaign and twelve challenge mode levels with official leaderboard support. Prepare to dive into dangerous and atmospheric facilities one more time as you take on hostile robots, rescue survivors, and of course overload the reactor!

name: Overload: Anniversary Level Pack
description: Celebrating the one-year anniversary (more or less) of the release of Overload, we present a new collection of community-created levels. The creators receive half the proceeds from the sales of this DLC.

name: True Combat: Elite
description: TrueCombat:ELITE is a total conversion mod for Wolfenstein: Enemy Territory that turns it into a tactical FPS: with realistic firearms and firearm handling, movement and locational damage.

name: In-Flight Trivia Tournament
description: Test your general knowledge by answering questions from a wide range of topics. You can play by yourself or compete against other players. If you don't know the answer, you'll be able to see it and learn something new.

name: In-Flight Sudoku
description: Sin descripción

name: In-Flight Golf
description: Sin descripción

name: In-Flight Bowling Tournament
description: Sin descripción

name: 2016 Doodle Fruit Games
description: The 2016 Doodle Fruit Games was a mini-game collection made by Google to celebrate the 2016 Summer Olympics. The game was exclusive to the Google app for a limited time.

name: Mordheim: City of the Damned - Hired Swords Bundle 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Mordheim: City of the Damned - Hired Swords Bundle 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Math+Sticks: Coffee Break Club
description: Math+Sticks: Coffee Break Club is a puzzle for math lovers with matchsticks that won't burn you, but will light up your mind. Challenge your mind to move, adding and removing matchsticks until you find the correct solution. How many tries do you need to solve each level?

name: Super Pinball Arcade
description:
Use the flippers, plungers or shake the machine to control the ball and try to get the highest score. Sit back and watch the ball mix in with the lights and sounds.

Available via the Inflight Entertainment Service on EVA Air flights.

name: Eulogy of an Insect
description: A skullcap-wearing woman makes a woefully wrong turn, ending up in a crapsack world full of fantastical creatures. Among them she finds misery, BUGS, apathy, and a shockingly strict adherence to paying one's fair share in taxes.

name: BlackJack Math Cross Numbers
description: Tease your brain in this ambient logic game where you have to make the math match 21 as a result horizontal and vertically (because we're talking about blackjack, right?) Swap the cards, make the math, repeat. That's all you'll need in order to complete this game!

name: Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers
description:
Dr. Robotnik's Ring Racers is a kart racing video game originally based on the 3D Sonic the Hedgehog fan-game "Sonic Robo Blast 2", which itself is based on a modified version of Doom Legacy. It is the sequel to Sonic Robo Blast 2 Kart.

Hang up your sneakers, because Dr. Robotnik and his ex-enemies are going go-karting! Use the untapped potential of rings to super-charge your vehicle across more than 200 crazy courses. With over 20 unique items and some of the hottest moves on this side of the Floating Island, this is Racing at the Next Level!

name: Hardwork Simulator
description:
It was a normal day at work. But your text editor started to get pretty Unstable.

Hardwork Simulator is the perfect game for you to play at work, on the university computer, or any other time you just want to have fun! Play a game while everyone around you think you are working as hard as hell.

Sounds fun, right? But not everything will be fun. Angry stickmen try to unmask you while you smash your keyboard trying to reach the end of the document.
Kill Stickmen and keep the mouse pointers away from your text by dropping letters on them. But you have to be careful not to lose too many letters or you will face the Blue Screen of Death!

name: Carnivalé: Cenzo's Adventure
description: A cancelled Nintendo 64 game based on a movie.

name: Too Easy
description:
Dear valued customer,

We are sorry that you found this game to be "too hard".

We have made every effort to ensure that this game is too easy and we apologise for any difficulty you may have experienced.

Furthermore, our reimbursement policy does not cover the computer peripherals you damaged in a "fit of rage".

Thank you for your understanding.

name: Shall We Golf?
description:
Are you worried that your golf skills are not improving? Don't take it all on yourself. Playing with your friends is a great way to solve this problem. The more people you have, the better. Go out with as many friends as you can!

It's easy, isn't it? It's all you need and your ball will fly straight to wherever you want it to go. Or rather, it's hard not to fly too far.

If your ball accidentally hits a friend, don't worry. They will laugh and forgive you. Of course, you too, please be prepared to take physical risks.

Remember, we are all a team. You may have one club, but you have as many chances as the number of your friends to get a shot. Sometimes, you just need to find the right spot, push the directional key and leave the club to your friends.

Have a nice golf!

name: Nimbus
description: Utilize our highly detailed flight system to control your gas expenditure, flap openings, and more :)

name: Bayonetta
description:
Remaster of the first installment of the Bayonetta series, first made available in the "Bayonetta & Vanquish 10th Anniversary" Bundle.

Bayonetta. The last survivor of an ancient witch clan who keep the balance between light, dark and chaos. Entombed to protect herself – and the world as we know it – Bayonetta is discovered and revived after 500 years, sparking a chain of events with cataclysmic repercussions.

name: First Love Diaries: A Kiss on the Beach
description: First Love Diaries - A Kiss on the Beach is an otome game by Voltage Inc. A start of a new school and a popular boy confesses to, start your first love in high school!

name: Shin Seizonritsu 0%! Chikatetsu Kara no Dasshutsu
description: Shin Seizon Ritsu 0%! Chikatetsu Kara no Dasshutsu is the first suspense novel game from Voltage Inc. and is currently only available in Japanese.

name: True Love Sweet Lies
description: You are working as a freelance photographer when you run into a gorgeous reporter at the news agency. Could this be the blossoming of new love…? Or is he really just after one of your photos!? All of those sweet nothings whispered in your ear, all of those delicate kisses… Was it all just part of their elaborate lie!? Meanwhile, lurking in the shadows, the Tokyo underground is after that photo… and your life!

name: In Your Arms Tonight 2
description: In Your Arms Tonight 2 is an otome game by Voltage Inc. and it is the sequel to In Your Arms Tonight featuring new characters.

name: Hareraiser II
description: Exploring a possible alternate reality for Hareraiser (1984), a controversial and nonsensical game with a treasure hunt behind it.

name: Forget Me Not, My Love
description: “We’re your fiances.” Three of your fiances show up after you wake up in the hospital! However, you can’t remember a single thing since you’ve lost all of your memories… Everything is a haze now due to you getting in an accident, and all you want to know is: who is your real fiance?

name: Finally, in Love Again
description: Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

name: Sakura Amidst Chaos
description: Sakura Amidst Chaos is an otome game by Voltage Inc. The story takes place in the Sengoku time period in ancient Japan. The characters are also based on famous warlords of the Sengoku period.

name: Samurai Love Ballad: Party
description:
Remake of Sakura Amidst Chaos with redrawn graphics.

Enter the world of the Warring States, where might and ambition will get you far. Discover the sort of love that only happens in legends or in the pages of a history book. Will you go earn the heart of samurai powerful enough to conquer ancient Japan, or operate behind the scenes alongside the ninja elite? What happens next is up to you. Fate is in your hands.

name: Destroyer
description: Unlicensed game.

name: Kiss Me on Clover Hill
description: Kiss Me on Clover Hill is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are a new college student who ends up living at an apartment with five other male students after her initial roommate kicked her out and you fall in love with one of the tenants.

name: Policeman
description: Unlicensed game released only in Spain.

name: Star-Crossed Myth
description:
Included in the "Love 365: Find Your Story" app.

Star-Crossed Myth is an otome game made by Voltage Inc. You are the reincarnation of a goddess and you fall in love with a god who you must help absolve his sin, but he commits another sin by falling in love with you.

name: Skate Boy
description: Unlicensed game released only in Spain.

name: Dark Souls II: Seeker of Fire
description: An overhaul mod for DS2 SOTFS that adds an entirely new experience to your next playthrough. This mod will rebalance the game mechanics and difficulty, as well as decorate and fill in objects in areas that feel a little empty, expanding upon the work of Tales of Drangleic.

name: El Monstruo de los Globos
description: Unlicensed game released only in Spain.

name: Butler Until Midnight
description: Butler Until Midnight is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are an ordinary woman until you find out that you're the daughter of one of Japan's prestigious families, and you fall in love with one of the five butlers that serve your father.

name: Princess in the Mirror
description:
A new title from the Otome Romance Series released in Japan in 2015, now in English!
From Voltage's famous interactive romance series comes the glitzy, fairy tale world of The Princess in the Mirror!

name: Gossip Girl: Party
description: A dating sim set in the Gossip Girl universe.

name: After School Affairs
description: After School Affairs is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are a teacher of a school where love is prohibited to students and teachers, but you end up falling in love with one of your coworkers.

name: Bad Boys Do It Better!
description: Bad Boys Do it Better! is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You are transferred to a school where it's nothing but delinquent boys and you're also living in a dorm with five of your classmates, where you fall in love with one of them.

name: Dangerous Seduction
description: Dangerous Seduction is an otome game by Voltage Inc. You're a freelance writer who gets caught up in a group of most-wanted fugitives, involved in a conspiracy, and on top of that, fall in love with a fugitive.

name: Love Brings You Home
description: Love Brings You Home is an Otome game by Voltage Inc. that's currently available in Japanese and English.

name: Hanazakari no Kimitachi e: Boys love you
description: Inspired by the hit manga "Hana-Kimi: For You in Full Blossom".

name: When Destiny Comes Knocking
description: When Destiny Comes Knocking is an Otome game by Voltage Inc. You just moved to a new housing area in Tokyo and after praying for love at a local shrine, you have suddenly become popular with guys!? Who will you pick?

name: Rose in the Embers
description:
Rose in the Embers is an otome game by Voltage Inc.

It is available on Google Play and iTunes via the Love 365 app.

name: Anidol Colors
description: Featuring two virtual idol groups, 7 Colors and Clarity, Anidol Colors' is Voltage's latest otome game for animal lovers and handsome guy admirers.

name: Digital ez LG
description:
A bundle of NES games released in some models of LG Electronics TV around 2008. Most games are actually bootleg versions of famous NES games, with lots of aesthetic changes (and some gameplay changes in some cases). There are two exclusive games: LG Chess and Quick Brain.

The games are:

- Soccer (Nintendo World Cup)
- Block!! Block!! (Arkanoid)
- Baseball (Baseball)
- Laser Man (Bomberman)
- Body Capsule (Dig Dug)
- Mobile Racing (Excitebike)
- Battle Star (Galaga)
- LG Chess
- Space Rocket (Star Force)
- Pocket Ball (Lunar Pool)
- Tennis (Tennis)
- Little Star (Antarctic Adventure)
- Perfect Puzzle (Magic Jewelry)
- Quick Brain
- Car Racing (Road Fighter)

name: Spring Crisis
description: This is a Touhou doujin game by 46flare.

name: Laser Man
description: One of the games released in the Digital ez LG bundle. It is an unlicensed mod of Bomberman, but goes beyond aesthetic changes, including a new running control (the player taps once in the wanted direction) and removal of the time limit.

name: Quick Brain
description: One of the games released in the Digital ez LG bundle. It is one of the two original games in it. It is a basic memory game.

name: LG Chess
description: A Chess game released in the Digital ez LG bundle, being one of the two original games in it.

name: The Enchanted Worlds 2
description: Enchanted Worlds 2 is a puzzle adventure game from Syntaxity studio. Find an ancient artifact, following the clues from the books. At the same time, you have to explore many locations, look for items and interact with the environment. Touch the doorway to move from one location to another. When you find items, tap them to add them to your inventory. You can always see these things in a satchel. To use an item, select it, then tap the screen where you want to use it. Some puzzles require you to find clues to solve the puzzle: explore the area to find them. You can always use a hint if something does not work out for you.

name: Kalpa: The Sign of Omen
description:
In July 1999, a strategy role-playing game developed by Dynasty International Information and published by Soft-World Technology was released along with the well-known computer magazine "Software and CD" in mainland China. This game is called "Kalpa: The Sign of Omen". Due to its low price of 25 yuan for the full version, it attracted a large number of players.

Most people were initially scared off by its difficulty, making the most common screen seen at the beginning "defeat." Then, there were a lot of game-breaking bugs, causing many players to have to start over. There was even a rumor online that the game company was treating players as free testers. As a result, the magazine "Software and CD" had to include a patch in its August issue to appease the players' anger.

In September 1999, the "enhanced version" of "Kalpa: The Sign of Omen" was released at a price of 69 yuan. In addition to a big box packaging, the game also came with a full-color manual and a fan comic. The game version was also upgraded to 1.1. This version looked like a deluxe edition, and many players who owned the standard edition were not interested in it. However, this version contained a big secret, which was the perfect ending of the game. The relevant levels were not included in the standard version.

name: Fear Us
description:
A car accident ... a missing family ... seemingly eternal darkness ...
Help our protagonist to reveal the dark mystery about the disappearance of her family and accompany her on an exciting and captivating horror trip full of unforeseen twists and scary moments ...
Sophia is alone and needs your help!
Only together you can solve the mystery!
You communicate in real time.

name: Sentry Paragon
description: In this isometric action game where enemies are coming at us in droves, we are trying to defend ourselves and survive against the growing and strengthening enemies by making the right strategy and moves!

name: Creme de la Creme: A Silver Spoon
description: Become Gallatin's top student in A Silver Spoon! Discover hard-to-reach paths, achieve the highest grades, or play on hard mode. With these hints and cheats you'll never be late for class again!

name: Rider of Justice
description: A top-down shooter where you run and gun down bad guys as the vigilante, Rider. Vastly outnumbered, quickly kill and quickly die as you sweep through multifloored buildings bringing criminals to justice.

name: FRZ Racing
description:
"FRZ: Free Racing Zero" brings high-paced retro racing mayhem back to the world.
Pull off insane stylish drifts as you speed your way to the finish line in this addictive, arcade, pick up and play racer!

name: Veloz
description: How far can you go stepping deep on the gas running straight through the intensively traffic streets of a city?

name: Crystalrect
description:
Crystalrect is challenging fast pace 3D auto-runner with stylish and colourful graphics terrace.
Your goal is to flip or jump and avoid all traps through the end of the level based on the terrace color.
With simple button control for this level-based crystal world you can collect all the crystals within the level and set a top score for each level.

name: Sidekick Cycle
description:
Sidekick Cycle is the most exhilarating “downhill” style gameplay experience ever for iOS. Use your skills to brave hazardous terrain, while heroically delivering bikes to kids in need.

Enhance your ride with an assortment of helpful Sidekicks, then push it to the breaking point as your hurtle at top speed through treacherous terrain filled with gravity-bending jumps and all that Mother Nature can throw at you!

name: Hockey Stars
description:
The world’s best multiplayer hockey game on mobile, from the creators of multiple smash-hit online sports games!
Take to the ice and become a legend in Hockey Stars! Face-off against the world in 1v1 multiplayer matches: power your shots into the goal, or use close-control and precision aim to hit the back of the net!
Play in different arenas for bigger prizes! Win tournaments, and unlock tons of teams with unique powers and styles. Let’s hit the ice and play Hockey Stars!

name: Scapefall
description:
Build and defend your nation against enemies by researching new technologies, designing and launching ballistic rockets, and deploying your military forces.
Over 15 rocket technologies allow for highly customized ballistic rockets - launch everything from incendiaries to nukes.

name: Jewel of Kings
description: Test your puzzle solving skills with this new take on solitaire card games. Explore the ruins to find valuable artefacts until you claim the Jewel of Kings. Use unique card abilities to gain strategic advantage.

name: Swish Ball!
description:
Get ready for the new basketball season in style! Swish Ball is a new and exciting take on the game that we all know and love.
Tap, hit, shoot, and swish before the 24s shot clock runs out. Challenge your friends for the big baller crown!

name: Math Heroes
description:
Math Heroes is a challenging game where you can use the power of Math to fight monsters. All you need to do is to solve math questions to make a hit. Questions can be simple at the beginning and incredibly difficult at the end.
You will face different types of enemies and each of them will try to defeat your Hero. There is only one way to win – you should answer quicker than enemy strikes you. And don’t even try to cheat, because every wrong answer lets the monster to make an advanced hit.
Each correct answer gives you coins that can help you to unlock upgrades. You can make the combo hit if you are successful in several mathematical questions in a row.

name: Pinball FX: Wrath of the Elder Gods
description: The end is nigh! Face the horror of the Elder Gods on this table packed with the unspeakable. Try to escape with your sanity...

name: Rhapsody II: Ballad of the Little Princess
description: Join Kururu on her journey to find true love and experience the charm of Rhapsody II's storybook adventure!

name: Serena Williams' Match Point
description: Serena Williams' Match Point was a tennis game that was playable in the SnapChat app.

name: Primarch
description: Primarch is a roguelike auto-battler centered on a single hero. After being exiled to a foreign planet, you are challenged by a fallen God and pitted against your comrades to determine who is most worthy of the title ‘Primarch’.

name: Clash: Blue Mirage
description: Save the day with Clash!

name: Fishing: Barents Sea: Line and Net Ships
description: Expand your fleet of ships with this DLC, adding five new vessels to your game of Fishing: Barents Sea. The ships are either compatible with line or net fishing and comes with its very own quota - so drive out and fish to your heart's content! There is plenty opportunity to explore the seas in search of new fishing grounds! More ships mean more quotas to fill!

name: Magical Delicacy
description: A wholesome pixel art platformer. Cook magical delicacies from a vast collection of ingredients in your own shop. Explore an unfamiliar town and deliver tasty treats to the townsfolk. Learn new ways to traverse, discover secrets, and experience a unique witchy world.

name: The Bride Horror Game
description: Investigation and horror game, where the player becomes a detective and seeks clues to unravel a mysterious case that took place years ago. Whenever the player restarts the game, the clues change position. The crime scene, weapons and culprits are also changed with each new match started.

name: Team Fortaleza 2 Mobile
description: Join the battle of heroes with unique weapons and skills. Fight in the competitive battlefield or capture the flag, or you can fight the belligerent robots. Create rooms and play with friends or anyone. Tactics and skills will help you win, but don't forget to combine with teammates. Just fight!

name: Lemmings
description: A unique mind-boggling game of multiple skill levels. Take command of the wackiest collection of misdirected rodents ever seen on your screen. Featuring fantastically animated graphics and simple yet addictive gameplay.

name: Tachyon Dreams I: The Radiant Fish of the Apocalypse
description: You're Dodger, a dish washer (a person, not a machine!) onboard Space Station Penrose, where temporal experiments are being conducted. One of them is about to go very wrong... Only you can save the fate of the timeline itself! With your, you know, stellar dishwashing skills an' all that!

name: Tachyon Dreams II: The Bloated Can of Space Root Beer
description: The adventures of Dodger through space and time continue! Previously a dish washer (person, not a machine!) onboard Space Station Penrose, Dodger must travel the space-time continuum and inter-dimensional highways to save the universe from the Tgorodians, a bunch of time-travelling thugs in search of the fabled Garden World!

name: Tachyon Dreams III: The Rancid Buttermilk from Andromeda
description: Tachyon Dreams III: The Rancid Buttermilk from Andromeda is the grand finale to the sci-fi comedy Tachyon Dreams text-parser trilogy! In his third adventure, Dodger explores a barren world, travels back in time to relive past moments, and then journeys to a dark forest on the edge of the cosmos. It is time to finally discover the fabled worlds of the Margdonians, which the greedy Tgorodians have searched for all this time.

name: Popgoes: Archives
description: An official collection of all of the major previously released Popgoes content, that is now non-canon due to the current reboot. Popgoes is a game series based on Five Nights at Freddy's.

name: Popgoes: Silent Night
description: The Silent Night would take place during the Christmas Day, 25th December 2024. After Fritz Glade died and "The London Bridge" was destroyed, Mike Schmidt Jr. was left at the edge of his sanity. The final night would take place in a strange, psychedelic version of The Popgoes Pizzeria, where Mike would have to fight Grave Stone, the representation of the broken connection between Fritz and Mike and embodiment of death. The goal of Mike is to kill himself before Grave Stone manages to do it.

name: Popgoes Encore!
description: Popgoes Encore was a scrapped sequel to Popgoes 2015 conceptualised in late 2015. It never reached a coding phase and it only had one fully "finished" model, made by Gunkystuff, and a bunch of Concept Art made by Pan Darcy and Pokefan993.

name: Popgoes 2015
description:
Popgoes 2015 was an original version of Popgoes game story. It was later changed into what is now in the released version of Popgoes.

The Popgoes lore went through a couple of major changes before the game was released. The original lore is being called Popgoes 2015, while the final version is called Popgoes 2016, as the main changes were established around the end of 2015.

name: Popgoes 2
description:
Popgoes 2 was supposed to be a continuation of the Grave Ending in Popgoes. After Fritz Glade was murdered, Simon went to Fritz's House to find more about himself, taking Strings with him. Simon and Strings would go to the Attic when they were attacked by the Dreamcatcher Animatronics.

The enemies were going to be Dreamcatcher Popgoes, Blake, Sara, Saffron and Stone. They were going to be created by a gigantic machine called "Help" which Jeremy haunts throughout the game.

Help is underground, Simon is on the main floor, and Strings is in the attic. The two floors of the house were an arena where you needed to cut their paths short so they don't reach the attic.

There were also planned smaller characters. Little inventions that Fritz made in his spare time.

name: Popgoes Reprinted
description: POPGOES Reprinted was a hybrid project of POPGOES 1: The Blackrabbit - the remake of POPGOES and POPGOES 2: The Dead Forest - the sequel and the final game to the series.

name: Popgoes 0
description: Popgoes 0, previously known as Popgoes IF, was a cancelled game created by Phil Morg. While initially created as a fangame, after revealing it to Kane, it was turned into a canon sequel meant to take place right before Popgoes 2. The plot would have involved Simon altering Strings' Curiosity module, making him hallucinate a new Popgoes Pizzeria with Simon as the main attraction, forcing him to survive against the "Generated Animatronics". The ending screen from Popgoes Arcade 2 teased Popgoes0, showing the Generated Popgoes' box. Popgoes 0 was later de-canonized due to the amount of changes to the plot of Popgoes 2 it required. After this, Phil cancelled the game.

name: Ninja Painter 2
description:
Ninjas have never been painting! Prepare for a fast-paced colourful adventure!

Ninja Painter 2 is an arcade puzzle game with addicting gameplay. Paint the walls through 36 levels in 6 different locations and try to get all the achievements!

name: The Slaying of Sandy Hook Elementary
description: Based on the shootings at Sandy Hook Elementary, perpetrated by Adam Lanza.

name: U.N. Squadron
description: Side-scrolling shoot-em-up, in a similar style to such games as Gradius, R-Type and Scramble. The aim is to wipe out the enemy, which has gathered around the allied airspace of 'Area 88', in a series of military aircraft-based scenarios. You choose one of three unique pilots; Shin Kazama, Micky Schymon or Greg Gates, each with varying abilities at damage repair, weapon handling and flying skill, and engage the enemy over a series of challenging missions. The player starts out with the weakest plane, the F8E Crusader, which can only be armed with a very basic range weapons. But, through completing various missions, enough cash can be raised to purchase higher-quality aircraft. These superior planes are more agile, have improved resilience to damage and have a greater range of fire. Furthermore, the more advanced fighters can be armed with superior special weapons, such as napalm. The missions include attacks on sand bases, the nuclear submarine 'Seavet' and enemy supply camps, as well as seeing off groups of airborne 'bandits' who swarm-in on Area 88. The enemy is plentiful, and the pace is frantic. Shoot at everything on the screen that moves, and the allied forces might just come out on top......

name: Cut the Head off the Snake
description: This is a race against time game, in this game, you can collect gold to restore your health and improve your combat ability, the time to defeat the boss is limited, if you don't beat the boss in the allotted time, the challenge will fail

name: Traveler
description: Explore an expansive and dynamic world.

name: Evan, Daniel and Friends. Vol 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Minna de Hayaoshi Quiz
description: Sin descripción

name: Russian Roulette
description:
It’s a battle of wits in this Soviet mind game!

The rule of the game is simple: plug in your Nintendo Zapper Lightgun, pull the trigger… and pray. Two players, six chambers, one bullet. See who comes out alive. Try a higher difficulty for a more risky challenge. Square off against another player or play against the CPU. Still up to the challenge? Then you’d better be lucky. Otherwise it’s lights out in this thrilling Nintendo Light Gun game!

name: Super Maruo
description: Super Maruo is an unlicensed game released in Japan in 1986. Although very rare, this game is the first unlicensed Famicom game and the first unlicensed adult Famicom game as well. Despite the name, it has no relation to Mario at all.

name: Asteroids Mining Saga
description: Collect rare minerals from the drifting in space Asteroids before you run out of moves! Link 3 or more minerals of the same colour to mine them. Use drills and bombs on your way and if lucky you’ll get to use the Universal Drill!

name: Terra Omega
description:
Control your team of specialists and outthink, outmaneuver and outflank the enemy.
Synergize your special abilities to control the battle field and dominate your foes.
Use cover to your advantage to hide from the enemy and draw them into your lines of fire.

name: Scrolls of Gloom
description:
Casual RPG with match 3 combat which is easy to learn and fun to play.

Finally the Casual RPG you've been waiting for! Scrolls of Gloom is not your average dungeon crawler which typically have high learning curves. It's a casual blend of character management, dungeon crawling and match 3 combat which is easy to learn and fun to play.

name: Domino Marble
description: I have a cute bead that likes candy. You make your way out of various blocks to collect the candy your marbles like and send them to the target. Find in many ways using physics. It may seem easy to collect all the candies, but can you get them all?

name: Shifted
description: To shift outside the box, you need to think outside the box. Think you can swipe your way though 30+ mentally exhausting levels? Then consider this a challenge!

name: Gem Jam
description:
It is colorful and looks simple and yet it is a challenging and addictive puzzle.
The goal is to toggle the colors of the gems, with a minimum number of steps, so they look like the pattern shown on the screen. You will also win gems when you solve the puzzle.
It's not that easy! When you tap a gem not only it changes its color but also the colors of its neighbors. You must plan your moves carefully, or you will find yourself in a bit of a jam.
If you are in trouble you can use the help button to show you the correct move, but it will cost you one gem.
There are plenty of levels to play for a long time and new ones will be added in future updates of the game. You won't get bored for sure!

name: Woodventure: Mahjong Connect
description:
Take a weekend trip through forest full of cute animals in this classic mahjong connect game. Mahjong connect games have simple rule: two tiles can be connected if path between them has maximum of two turns. Your target is to clear whole board.
Woodventure has 18 levels and you are traveling from one to next on map of the wood.

name: Calisteo
description:
Explore fantastic fantasy worlds where you will have to master your skills as a match-3 expert to guide your character through a maze of puzzles of to unlock the key to overcome the dangers that lie ahead!
Calisteo is new kind of match-3 game that pits your matching your skills against increasingly difficult levels combined with the puzzle solving prowess needed to overcome the perils that block your path. Use your cunning and quick reflexes to unlock the doors and enter fantastic new worlds.

name: Cannibal Cookout: Lines
description: This is a sister game to the hugely popular Cannibal Cookout. Lines is a super addictive, simple, yet challenging puzzle game. Remove Cannibal Cookout themed pieces from the board by lining up five pieces of the same colour in a vertical, horizontal or diagonal direction. Earn gold and skulls that can be transferred straight into Cannibal Cookout and spent at the General Store. Testing wits and reflexes, more pieces are added after every move, forcing you to think ahead to stop the board from filling up. Use special power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

name: Into the Dungeon
description: Going down to the Dungeon for the treasures of the immortal ghost, you have embarked on a dangerous path. Each turn is fraught with danger, and each step may be your last one. Can you steal the treasure and get out from the dungeon?

name: Nozoku
description:
A casual game of logic and numbers. Each puzzle has "easy" and "hard" solutions. Can you earn all the stars?
Play over 40 puzzles at your own pace. Undo, reset, or skip puzzles at any time.
The rules are simple: Combine two tiles to subtract the smaller number from the larger. Keep combining tiles until all the numbered tiles are gone. Use up all the tiles (including blanks) to earn stars.
Give your brain a twist with nozoku!

name: Dot Brain
description: Dot brain is a braintastic game for every puzzle games fan! Help the lovable brains regain their happiness and fortune!

name: Geometry League
description: You like soccer? You like space ships? Geometry League is made for you! Enter the first online inter galactic league and face off players from all other the world!

name: Scan Alien
description: Arrest the aliens disguised in human form!

name: Slope Car
description: Race your car on a randomized slope. Boost over ramps and jump from platform to platform. Stunt through loops and tunnels and avoid various obstacles while on full speed. Drive as far as you can and test your skills in this fast adrenaline rush.

name: Milton Cumberdale
description: Don't run into the wall, Milton.

name: Spawn Runner
description: You are a lonely tourist on a fantasy world. There're many obstacles standing on your way. You have to avoid them by spliting or merging yourself. Keep at least one clone alive. Try your best to beat your friends score via Game Center and to unlock interesting characters.

name: Get Ghost!
description:
Meet Ghost, the biggest menace to hit Stunt City after the Big Quake.
Ride with him and his misfit friends. Break all the speed limits and get to visit all of Stunt City while being chased by the entire police force.
Get Ghost! is the next generation running game! You can jump, duck, rocket jump, glide, fly planes, climb on cars, ride clouds, jump on roofs and pass through buildings.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Best Places
description: Best Places for you to visit by playing, Jigsaw Puzzle Best Places is a minimalist game with 5 difficulty levels (64, 144, 289, 484, and 784 pieces) with over 50 beautiful landscapes.

name: Bala na Manga
description:
A mobster stole you, get back what's yours in turn-based duels!!
You must choose between to shoot, to reload or to dodge.

name: Zebra Logic Master
description: Do you belong to the only 2% of the world population that is able to solve Einstein's Puzzle? Discover here!

name: Party Demon
description: Party Demon is a tower defense, deck-building game where your main goal is to protect a Lady Demon’s birthday party from human intruders. Build your castle on a budget and defend it in real time with a deadly Trap Deck full of demonic weapons.

name: Super-Patriota Simulator
description: Heads up! In 72 hours something very important will happen, stay in the streets, do your part and wait for the armed forces! For the future of the country and for the future of your children! The Super-Patriot is coming!

name: Drop Dead: The Cabin
description:
The Cabin is an intense and challenging game. Are you among the few that will survive? Gather supplies, arm up, and fight off waves of the walking dead that have escaped from an evil lab experiment. We expect you to die - a lot, each time you fall, you will earn XP to upgrade your character and weapons, making you stronger and bringing you one step closer to beating the game. Whether you play co-op or brave the horrors of hell solo - Fight with a blade, bat or a variety of guns, power up and become a pro monster slayer.

Can you hold off the horde before they breach the Cabin? Do you have what it takes to survive?

name: Saimin School Days: Hypnotic School Days
description: The protagonist has acquired an app that can hypnotize others. Is school life with hypnosis bright and fun? Or...

name: Club Penguin
description: The Club Penguin app was a free mobile application for Club Penguin, fully released on May 9, 2013 for Apple devices and December 18, 2014 for Android devices. The app was compatible with any of the aforementioned brands with operating systems of either iOS 7 or Android 4.0.3 and above. In addition to being released for iPads on May 9, 2013, the app was available to download for iPhone and iPod on April 16, 2014.

name: Beyond These Stars
description: Journey on the back of the space whale Kewa, building a city for your people as you travel across the galaxy seeking purpose and answers, and developing deep relationships with the universe around you.

name: Pucca Puzzle Adventure
description: Puzzle RPG Adventure with Lovely Pucca! 3 years ago, the cosmic villain Dong King led his army to the Earth. Dong King began to distribute low-quality food that can control the people's minds. People who consumed Dong King's food soon became mindless minions of Dong King. Dong King's army reached Suga Island, Pucca's home.

name: Kaguya-sama: Love Is War
description: Confessing love to someone is one of the most intimidating challenges we face in our lives. Kaguya-sama: Love is War takes this relatable fear to the extreme. This visual novel isn't your average rom-com; it's a fight between two stubborn geniuses in a battle of who will confess first.

name: Knights of Takhisis Bundle Pack
description: The Knights of Takhisis Bundle Pack includes three Skin & Feat packs that feature Arkhan, Krull, and Torogar, the Dark Order, as if they had sworn fielty to Takhisis instead of Tiamat! Collect these Krynn versions of the Dark Order characters today!

name: The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker - Limited Edition
description:
The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker is the first Zelda game for the Nintendo GameCube and also the first in the series to employ cel-shading, a lighting and texturing technique that results in the game having a cartoon-like appearance. Like its predecessors, The Wind Waker is an action game with puzzle-solving and light role-playing elements. Basic gameplay mechanics are similar to those found in Ocarina of Time, but it differentiates itself with its massive Great Sea which must be explored using a boat named King of Red Lions.

The limited edition of The Legend of Zelda: The Wind Waker includes the game itself and a second disk containing:
- Ocarina of Time
- Ocarina of Time Master Quest

name: Frontier Hunter: Weapon Package
description: In order to protect novices, the following weapons and equipment are provided: Taidao Silver Snow S, Gatlin - Red Flame S and Double Blades - Determination S

name: Grimm Tales
description: Surviving your own fairy tale, brave knight, requires first reliving seven of the Brothers Grimm's most classic stories. Find the seven dwarfs, awaken Sleeping Beauty, protect Little Red Riding Hood, escort Cinderella, and more. My, what big jackpots you have!

name: The Settlers: New Allies - Deluxe Pack
description: The Settlers: New Allies Deluxe Pack includes in-game content and digital items.

name: Daegeonmulju: Geonmulju Kiugi
description: Sin descripción

name: Farming Simulator 22: Göweil Pack
description: Take the joy of baling multiple steps further with Göweil! Operate a diversified set of professional baling and wrapping technology and equip your farm with nine new machines and tools. The Göweil Pack adds new possibilities while improving the quality and efficiency of your operation that depends on baling your valuable resources.

name: Shinshou Ikemen Ooku
description: Sin descripción

name: Pinball FX: Zen Originals Collection 1
description:
Zen Originals Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- CastleStorm
- Secrets of the Deep
- Rome
- Biolab
- Pasha
- Son of Zeus
- Adventure Land

name: Pinball FX: World War Z Pinball
description: Outlive the dead to climb the leaderboards! The zombie horde forced your group to hide and you are now stuck in the overrun Central Mall. Score big and roll through hordes of Zeke to help the survivors escape this forsaken place.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - World Cup Soccer
description: Travel the United States and work your way up to the finals to be named World Champion! Juggle and dribble your ball, take aim, and score to pave your way to victory.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - The Addams Family
description: They're creepy and they're kooky, mysterious and spooky! Join The Addams Family in the classic, bestselling pinball adventure of all time.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball - Swords of Fury
description: Unleash the fury of this 1988 solid state classic! Join the legendary Lion Man and prove your might! All in a world of sword and sorcery full of heroes, villains, and mythical monsters.

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Collection 2
description:
Williams Pinball Collection 2 brings the following tables:

- White Water
- Red and Ted's Road Show
- Hurricane
- Cirqus Voltaire
- Tales of the Arabian Nights
- No Good Gofers
- Funhouse
- Space Station
- Dr. Dude and his Excellent Ray

name: Pinball FX: Williams Pinball Collection 1
description:
Williams Pinball Collection 1 brings the following tables:

- The Getaway: High Speed II
- Junk Yard
- Medieval Madness
- Black Rose
- Attack from Mars
- Party Zone
- Theatre of Magic
- Safe Cracker
- The Champion Pub
- White Water
- Red & Ted's Road Show
- Hurricane
